address: 155 McCrearys Beach, Perth, ON, K7H 3C8
description:
Get set for family fun this summer and rent one of McCreary's Beach Resorts 1 to 3 bedroom cottages in Perth. Stay mid-week from only $199/night*Located near Ottawa, enjoy a fun, family-friendly and pet-friendly environment with all-inclusive amenities and ample local attractions nearby to enjoy.

Book with McCreary's Beach Resort, Book with Confidence
When you book a resort cottage with us, we guarantee** that if your stay is affected by coronavirus, you can change your booking for a later date OR cancel your booking and receive a full refund, allfree of charge up to 3 days before your stay!

There is always something fresh and exciting happening at our resort. Children are building sandcastles, learning to swim, catching their first fish, roasting marshmallows and making lasting friendships that develop around campfires. We offer fun-filled activities for the kids and they especially enjoy visits from our mascots; Darren the Heron, Ricky the Racoon and Sally the Skunk.

We host a variety of family events throughout the season from pig roasts to Thanksgiving potlucks, surrounded by the fall splendour of Mississippi Lake. We shake up the holidays with Christmas in July and Halloween on Labour Day Weekend. There is no doubt we make family memories that last a lifetime.


Mississippi Lake is known for its fishing, swimming and boating. There are a few islands where our families like to drop anchor and picnic. Our cottagers have free use of kayaks, canoes, paddleboards and a paddleboat. We also have a pontoon boat and a Skipper who is happy to offer pontoon excursions or tubing adventures.


McCreary's Beach Resort is nestled on Mississippi Lake; minutes from the historic Town of Perth and only 45 minutes from downtown Ottawa. McCreary's Beach Resort is open from May 1st to October 31st.


Enjoy a stress-free cottage getaway along with all-inclusive amenities including:

  • Pontoon Boat Tours

  • Motor Boat Rentals

  • Boat Launch

  • Fishing

  • Indoor Pool

  • Multi-Sports Court

  • Playground

  • Kidz Klub

  • Gym

  • Cafe

  • Family Entertainment


Price:

Stay Mid-Week from only $199/Night*
Best of all, kids stay free!

Address:

155 McCreary's Beach, Perth, K7H 3C8

So what are you waiting for? Pack up Fido, the kids and your groceries and well take care of the rest! Book your 2020 Resort Cottage Vacation today!

address: 131 Rathwell Shore Rd, Carleton Place, ON K7C 4L4, Canada
description:
NO Vacancies. Cancellations will be listed below. You won’t be able to say enough about the beauty and the location of this pet friendly waterfront cottage on Mississippi Lake, less than ten minutes from downtown Carleton Place, and a 35 minute drive from downtown Ottawa.

This simple compact cottage comes equipped with all your requirements for a real country retreat away from the city, but closes enough to commute. The cottage is clean and functional, not fancy and is the lowest price you will find on the lake.

The eat-in kitchen is equipped with fridge, stove, microwave, toaster, dishes, cutlery and pots and pans. Bring your own drinking water.

Bathroom has a bath with shower, toilet and small sink. Sleeps 4 in the 3 bedrooms, and more on the double pull-out and sofa in the living room (maximum occupancy is 6)

Living room comes with sofa, occasional chair, desk and airtight stove, HDTV, Blu-ray, stereo and great lake view.

The deck is feet away from Mississippi Lake. It has a screened Gazebo, BBQ, picnic table and chairs and a stunning view.

There is a dock and a fire bowl. You can swim; launch your kayaks, canoes and small motor boats at the cottage. For bigger boats you can use the public boat launch in Carleton Place. There is a canoe and paddle boat for use by visitors (with paddles and pfd’s). The cottage is pet friendly.

Parking for two vehicles is available beside the cottage.

Cell phones from all major providers work fine and are your source of internet.


Mississippi Lake is a well-looked after lake with great fishing and boating, many varieties of birds and other wildlife, and this location is very close (within a couple of kilometres) to a quiet, little known but very good golf course (Scottish Glen). Carleton Place is a lovely country location which has a variety of shops, a Saturday Farmers market and many other amenities, events and locations of interest. You are between 20 to 30 minute drive from nearby Almonte, Perth and Smith falls.

Booking week long stays at the moment (Sunday to Sunday) – will open to weekend only stays in Mid-June. Bookings on a ‘first come, first served’ basis. Book early to avoid disappointment.

Current Availability: None


The cottage will be professionally cleaned and sanitized after each visit this summer.

Free parking available upon request. Free parking street. A bus stop, and a small shopping area are just 5 minutes away on foot. It is a 5 minutes drive to the South Keys Shopping Center, and 10 minutes drive to the airport.

A couple of references for each person required.

Virtual viewing available as well as in-person viewing (social distancing and official mandate must be followed).

Renewable 2, 3 or 4 month period lease (The sum covering the entire period of a lease is payable at start of each lease in the form of E-transfer (each lease is 6 pages long and must be read and signed before renting a room).

If you are looking for a month to month lease or no lease rental, please do NOT reply to this posting, This is NOT a month to month lease.

address: 118 Lower Charlotte St, Ottawa, ON K1N 8K3, Canada
description:
Downtown Ottawa- Furnished Rental, Close To Everything!!

Available August/September 1st!

Short and Long Term Stays welcome! Professionally Cleaned and Sanitized!

Located on beautiful and historic MacDonald Gardens Park, this quiet, secure, 2 bedroom, non-smoking Apt has been renovated and tastefully decorated. One block from the Rideau River and running/cycling trails. Minutes to lively village of New Edinburg and Byward Market, grocery stores, pubs and restaurants.

Walking distance to Global Affairs, Ottawa U, Parliament and many Embassies. This apartment boasts the following amenities:

•	Large 12’x12’ private deck with patio table and propane BBQ

•	Separately control heat and air conditioning

•	Free parking

•	Free wifi

from $2,599 per month, all inclusive, on year lease.

Weekly/Bi-weekly/Monthly Cleaning plans available, but extra

Viewings by appointment only... this apartment has everything you need.... just bring your suitcase!

address: 250 Lett St, Ottawa, ON K1R 0A7, Canada
description:
Rarely available 2 Bedroom + 2 full Bathroom condo rental in Lebreton Flats.

8-month sublet available from September 1st - April end.


Laundry (In Unit), Air Conditioning, dishwasher, oven and fridge included and has a private balcony.

Includes 1 underground parking spot and a storage locker.

address: 6 Booth St, Ottawa, ON K1R 6K8, Canada
description:
BRAND NEW 1 BEDROOM, BARRY HOBIN DESIGN, CENTERTOWN ZIBI KANAAL CONDO

320 Miwate Private, Ottawa, K1R0E1

BRAND NEW! Be one of the few to experience Zibi: one of Canada's most sustainable communities, and rarely-seen upscale island living with downtown amenities.

Inspired by the traditional Dutch canal homes of Amsterdam, designed by Barry J. Hobin & Associates Architects Inc. “Kanaal” is the first residential building in the Zibi community.


The location of this condo is a perfect pairing of a convenient urban location surrounded by nature. The building sits on the edge of the canal, parks, Chaudiere Falls and a network of bike paths are all at your doorstep. You are also helping the environment by mitigating your carbon footprint thanks to the building LEED Platinum designation and revolutionary district thermal heating and cooling system.


Centrally located, minutes from downtown Ottawa, downtown Hull (Place du Portage), the Pimisi LRT station (1km from condo), and near Ottawa's most popular festival site, Lebreton

Flats.


FEATURES:

This unit is on the fifth floor of a six storey building that opens onto the beautifully landscaped Head Street Square, a vibrant public courtyard offering a mix of shops, restaurants, cultural

spaces and outdoor seating areas.


Modern, eco-friendly finishes, granite countertops and luxury laminate flooring.


Brand new stainless steel kitchen appliances (fridge, stove, and dishwasher)

Laundry: washer/dryer

Underground parking

Balcony

Bike parking and personal storage locker

Access to gym and rooftop terrace


AVAILABLE: as of August 15, 2020.

RENT INCLUDES: water, locker and underground parking. Unfurnished.

No pets / no smoking (owner allergies).

address: 920 Dynes Rd, Ottawa, ON K2C 0J5, Canada
description:
This house is perfect for young professionals going to Carleton University or Algonquin College.


Features

• Many recent renovations

• 4 bright bedrooms with lots of closet space

• 1 large full bath and ½ bath

• Large open area dining room

• Large open area living room

• Large storage space in basement

• Clean fenced back yard (Perfect for BBQ)

• Appliances include Fridge, Stove, Washer, and Dryer all in great shape

• 1 underground secure parking (additional parking available in visitor area)

• Access to indoor pool


Transportation

• 5 minute walk to Mooney’s Bay

• 2 minute walk to grocery store, pharmacy, and restaurants

• 2 minute walk to public transportation

• 15 minute walk or 5 minute bus ride to Carleton University along the scenic Canal

• 15 minute bus ride to Algonquin college


Address: 920 Dynes

address: 1444 Hemlock Rd, Ottawa, ON K1K, Canada
description:
1444 Hemlock Road


Absolutely stunning three storey townhome available for rent in the sought-after Wateridge! This custom two bedroom home + den is loaded with upgrades including: hardwood flooring, open concept living, modern and chic finishes, private oversized balcony off living area, upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances and breakfast bar, luxurious Master Bedroom with walk in closet + ensuite, spacious second bedroom with their own washroom close by, private den/office on main level (perfect for use as a home office, if desired) attached garage, and the list goes on! PLUS be the envy of all your friends with your own private, wrap around rooftop terrace! Enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning this summer on your own rooftop. This home is truly amazing. You can live close to some of the best Ottawa has to offer. Upgrade your living today!


Move in as soon as September 1, 2020. Utilities are extra. Tenant Insurance is required.


Email us today for more information!

Sales Representatives – RE/MAX Hallmark Realty Group

kim@kimtranteam.com

address: 324 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON K1P 0A4, Canada
description:
324 Laurier Ave Unit 1912


Parking available for an additional $150/m! WOW! This is downtown living done right! Welcome to the sought-after and desirable Mondrian in the heart of Ottawa! Built by Urban Capital, this beautiful one bedroom condo has everything you want AND need including high quality finishes, hardwood floors, open-concept living, views that will leave you breathless, great sized Master Bedroom, spacious private balcony, in-suite laundry (brand new GE energy efficient stacked washer and dryer being installed!) and the list goes on! You can't beat the panoramic cityscape views from the 19th level with floor to ceiling windows! Plus, this condo is located centrally in Centretown - walk to delicious restaurants, trendy shops, and even Parliament Hill! Building amenities include an outdoor pool, exercise centre, BBQ area, party room and concierge! Everything you need just steps away! Come fall in love today!


Please note, there is no parking or storage locker included with this unit. Move in beginning August 1, 2020!


Email us today for a showing! You’ll be happy you did!

address: 1971 St. Laurent, Ottawa, ON, K1G 3P8
description:
Ask about our New Move-in Offer

** DROP-IN ANYTIME BETWEEN 11AM - 5PM ON SATURDAY & SUNDAY (BY APPOINTMENT) **

Health & Safety Measures: We have the Healthy Suite Program in place for an added level of protection for you and your family before you move-in.
  • Entire suite is fogged with a Health Canada approved disinfectant: Bedrooms(s), Bathroom(s), Living Room, Closet(s), Kitchen
  • Microbe shield treatment of the high-touch areas including: All Doorknobs & Handles, Light switches, Taps & Faucets, Kitchen Appliances, Entire Bathroom(s), Balcony/Terrace.
Unit Features: Fully renovated spacious suites with open-concept kitchen featuring chrome accents, breakfast bar, laminate countertops, new over mount sink, and tiled backsplash. Stainless-steel Refrigerator, Stove, Dishwasher (in select units) and Microwave are included. Bathrooms include upgraded fixtures, new mirror, and new vanity with laminate countertop. The unit is freshly painted, has newly finished flooring, new tiles in the kitchen and bathrooms, brand-new light and hardware fixtures. 

Key Building Amenities:
  • AC included
  • Heat and Water included
  • On-site laundry facility
  • Outdoor parking ($)
  • Visitor parking
  • Full equipped gym
  • Outdoor Swimming Pool
  • Pet Friendly
  • Controlled access and surveillance cameras
  • Enhanced cleaning procedures in high traffic areas
  • Thorough cleaning of every suite before you move-in
  • Friendly and professional property management trained to ensure that your home is a clean, and safe environment while confined to your suite
  • Property Vista is available for ease of rental payments, maintenance requests, and communication with property management, all accessible from your personal device or online.
This beautiful building is in close proximity to local shopping plaza & big box stores for your day to day necessities. Its close-by parks, schools, medical facilities, has easy access to public transit and major highways.  The beautiful Elmvale Area is also close to local hospitals, including CHEO, as well as the Museum of Science and Technology. If you are looking for an apartment in East Ottawa, you have found your new home! A visit will convince you.

You can now view our properties via our 360 degree virtual tours from comfort of your home. Our on-site leasing consultants are also available to tour you through building amenities and available suites via a personal video call.

description:
Looking for Professionals or Families for this gorgeous and newly renovated 2 bedroom 2 full bath lower unit appartment in Nepean (merivale and viewmount) that includes best of everything.


Located in close proximity to Algonquin College, Merivale High School, Nepean Sports Complex, Farmboy, Metro, Best Buy, Costco, Walmart and a range of other big names. Lots of restaurants available as well in close proximity.


This lovely basement appartment, with large windows, has a garage entrance and is inclusive of heating/cooling, water and hydro. The apartment comes with all 5 new appliances (fridge, stove, microwave, dishwasher and washer & dryer).


Monthly rent: $1,850

• Readily available for occupancy

• You will be asked to fill out a rental application form. First and last month rent required

• Heat, hot water, lawn/garden maintenance included in rent

• Open-concept living and kitchen includes stainless steel fridge, stove, microwave, dishwasher and breakfast bar.

• In unit, private laundry room with loading washer and dryer!

• Two large bedrooms both with a closet, ceiling light and large windows

• 2 full bathrooms with shower/tub, modern vanity, and window

• Modern laminate flooring throughout

• Entrance to basement apartment through garage

• Shared access to landscaped front and back yard for lounging or BBQ

• Perfect for Professionals and small family.

• Looking for non smokers and no pets

• 1 Driveway parking available, additional street parking available

• Close to public transit (111, 80, 83, 89, 96)

• Credit/background/police check and landlord & employment references and tenant insurance are required.


Please reply with more info about yourself and your readiness for going with the application process.


Only serious applications please. I thank you for your interest and look forward to hearing from you!

address: , Ottawa K1Z 8H3 ON, Canada
description:
We are offering a bachelor apartment located at Merivale and Baseline Rd. The apartment are available for Aug 1 occupancy.


Our one and two apartments are is approx 550ft2 and 800 ft2. The bachelor is more compact at 350ft2 but does have its own kitchen and 4 piece bath. It is in an older building so the apartments are larger then the new units. It has been renovated with new kitchen, bathroom, windows, and refinished hardwood flooring . The living room for the one and two bedrooms measures 12 ft by 20-22 ft, separate or combo dinning room, and the bedroom measures 15 ft by 9 ft and/or 10 ft by 9 ft. The kitchen has been renovated with the addition of new oak cabinet doors and granite countertop. The kitchen for the one bedroom available is compact, not a large kitchen. The unit has hardwood flooring throughout. Some unit also has a balcony.


The apartment is located just off Merivale Road near Baseline Road. Bus stop with express and local buses to downtown and down Merivale Road less then half a block away. Short bus ride to new LRT. Close proximity to Algonquin College at Centerpoint and Carleton university. Shopping within walking distance at Westgate mall and with easy access to the merivale shopping area at between Baseline and Hunt Club Road.


Heat and hot water are included in the rent for the one and two bedroom apartments. Tenant pays hydro for the one and two bedroom apartment. All utilities are included for the bachelor apartment. The rent $1100 for the one bedroom apartment with balcony and $1400 for a two bedroom unit. Bachelor apartment rents are $1000.

Parking is available from the office if required.


For more information or to book a viewing, contact Marion at 613-728-7103 between the hours of 10 am and 7 pm.


Note: For the duration of the public health emergency, we will conduct the interview for the apartment rental by telephone prior to schedule the viewing appointment.

Two good-sized bedrooms on third floor, Master bedroom with walk-in-closet. Spacious main bathroom. Oversized attached garage, and laundry room on first floor. End-unit with east and south side windows. Centrally located in Barrhaven, near Strandherd, close to shopping, Highway. Viewing possible after July 29.

address: 400  Montfort Street, Ottawa, ON, K1L 8G6
description:
One and two bedroom apartments are available at Place Montfort Apartments, 400 Montfort Street in Ottawa's east end, just four kilometres from the Parliament buildings.

With three great layouts to choose from, the apartments feature refrigerator, range and dishwasher, in-suite storage and balcony in a secure, high-rise building.

Residents will enjoy the tenant lounge/party room with kitchen facilities, billiards and darts room, heated outdoor pool and patio area with propane barbecues.

Advertised rental rates represent the lowest price available and may vary from unit to unit.

Professionally managed by Shelter Canadian Properties Limited.


Location Details

Place Montfort is located west of St. Laurent Boulevard and one block north of Montreal Road. The property is close to schools, shopping and transportation services.

address: 390  Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON, K1L 8H1
description:
Desirable luxury apartments and townhomes are available at Chateau Janeville, located minutes from downtown Ottawa. Choose from three bedroom townhomes or one and two bedroom apartments. Our renovated units come with a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, hardwood, carpeting and laminate floor options and sheer curtains. Townhouses have a wood-burning fireplace, a washer and a dryer.

Additional features include:

- Balcony

- In-suite storage

- Heated outdoor pool, propane barbecue area at poolside, fully equipped gym, social room

Advertised rental rates represent the lowest price available and may vary from unit to unit.

Professionally managed by Shelter Canadian Properties Limited.


Location Details

Chateau Janeville is located on the south side of Montreal Road, between Lafontaine Avenue and Ducharme Boulevard, approximately four kilometres from the Parliament Buildings. The property is within easy walking distance of rapid transit and is also located close to the St. Laurent Shopping Centre.

address: Aylmer Avenue, Ottawa K1S2W9 ON
description:
This huge two-story suite has everything and is in the perfect location for a downtown professional commuting and working from home - or a few student friends living together.

2 full baths

Fully renovated two years ago

address: Somerset Street East and Blackburn Avenue, K1N 6W4, Ottawa, ON

Medium-sized 2 bedroom apartment.

address: 200 Stewart St, Ottawa, ON K1N 6J9, Canada
description:
Large, recently renovated 4 bedroom apartment in the heart of Sandy Hill, steps away from the University of Ottawa, Loblaws, LCBO, Pizza Pizza, Bytowne Cinema & several convenience stores. Features hardwood floors, granite countertops, a dishwasher & stainless steel appliances.


Secure building features coin laundry in the basement, & is protected by 24hr surveillance cameras. Fob-operated, keyless access to front door, side door, & apartments. Snow-removal crew removes snow after every storm & sprinkles walkways & steps with salt. Building is cleaned once a week as well.


Laundry facility onsite: two washers & two dryers are located in the basement for convenience.


Fully landscaped property, & access to a beautiful, private garden next door.


ADDRESS 200 STEWART

HEAT & WATER & INTERNET INCLUDED

address: 87 Mann Avenue, Ottawa, ON, K1N 6Y8
description:
Smart Living Properties' furnished studio apartments in a beautiful, modern building. Perfect for young professionals or mature students. Various studio apartment layouts are available in our Spire side areas for September, 2020.

Spire Side Studio Prices Ranging from $1,280.00 - $1,1475.00

Your suite comes complete and equipped with:

  • Stainless steel appliances
  • Cookware & Kitchenware
  • Small appliances such as kettle, toaster and coffee maker
  • Dining table and chairs
  • Bed + mattress(es)
  • 32" Smart TV

The First Floorprovides all the extracurricular space you could want after a long day of class or work. There is a perfect space to meet everyones' needs, whether you're spending time with new friends discussing the days events, reviewing your notes, curling up with a book, or watching the latest movie. Enjoy our huge lounge, quiet roomand private theater as much as you want!

The Lounge

Seating for 42 people

  • Aesthetic fire place and accompanying seating arrangements
  • Cozy place to relax, read, play cards and unwind
  • Perfect for anyone staying in The Spire
  • 70 TV Smart TV for you to watch

Private Theatre / TV Room

Seating for 8

  • 120" Screen
  • Reservations available for movie bookings
  • Xbox and PlayStation provided


Quiet Study Room

Seating for 20

  • Quiet study room
  • Tables to seat singles or groups of 4, 7

Bike Storage Room

  • Indoor, secure room with space for 19 bicycles

Launderette

  • 3 washers, 4 dryers on site
  • Brand new coin operated machines

Rooftop Patio

We know its not always about study nights or staying home, this is where you can kick back under the sun or stars. Relax under the gazebo or catch some rays outside on the deck.

Weekends are ideal for a BBQ, and the patio is a great place to unwind with friends from the stress of the week! Invite your friends and let them enjoy the view and a seating on the rooftop patio!

** Price does not include parking or some utilites.

For further information,to book a touror to reserve a suite, please email us through this listing and include the best phone number for us to reach you at.

address: 253 York Street, Ottawa, ON, K1N 5T9
description:
ABOUT THE NEW YORK Designed for:

Individuals seeking design that intersects with minimalism.

Keeping life simple and uncluttered by adhering to the bare essentials. THE NEW YORK is influenced by Japanese aesthetics evolved around clean and uncluttered living, holding tightly to balance, and a love of sharp lines and symmetry.

From the hallways to our exterior, THE NEW YORK will evoke feelings of tranquility, calmness and peace.

While being located in the heart of downtown Ottawa, THE NEW YORK encompasses a residential and family filled neighborhood.

Inclusive living:

All utilities are included.

(AC/Heat/Water/Hydro/1G Internet)

All you need to do is show up with your luggage.

We have also fully furnished your apartment with new Tom Dixon furniture, LIFX Beams and Bulbs, 55' Android TV, fully equipped kitchen, bath towels, linens, duvet, pillows, art work.

    We also included LIFX Beams in everyroom which enable you to have a self-controlled ambiance.

    Our lighting solution is app based which means you're enabled to controlled the lighting experience and mood in every room.

    2--SUPER FAST INTERNET!

    Each apartment receives their own modem/router. The speed is 1G Download and 500MB Upload.

    Our internet service provider is ROGER'S and we chose the best available package for speed and data, that is available in the market.

    3--LOCATION!

    We are a stones throwaway from the largest grocery store in all of downtown Ottawa.

    We are a footsteps away from the beautiful Parliament Hill.

    We are 10 min on FOOT away from University of Ottawa.

    4--DESIGN!

    Our finishes make up of stainless steel through out the entirety of the apartment with a deep black wood flooring, accompanied by white carrera granite counters and walls in the bathroom, with tints of chrome along the glass shower doors.

    Our kitchens include carrera white granite counters along with Stainless steel SEKTION cabinets.

    Our living rooms are furnished with Tom Dixon designed Delaktig furniture.

    5--SERVICE!

    We are a very hands on landlord and believe in high-touch service.

    Our building contains security cameras and FOB keys which means neighbors can't share passcodes to get in!

    Our concierge desk will be filled with staff 9 hours a day, and in addition, an onsite supervisor for the building will be living there to help troubleshoot issues if anything arises 24/7.

    We believe our apartments will be superior in design and customizable lighting experiences compared to what else is available in the Ottawa Downtown landscape.

    To book a viewing please email us or visitsmartlivingproperties.ca/rental-options and click "Book Tour"

address: 2 Madden Court, Ottawa K2J 4L9 ON
description:
Available August 1st, August 15th, or September 1st. The sooner the better but my priority is finding a compatible housemate.


Full-Time working male (60+ hours/week) seeking housemate to share 3 bedroom furnished* town house.

Available for August 1st, August 15th, or September 1st. Earliest date preferred.


* New coffee/end tables are ordered, waiting on delivery. You will need your own bedroom furnishings but there is an available queen size bed in the spare room that could be used temporarily.


Female preferred (cats are anxious around other males and I've always had a positive experience with female housemates, previous tenants will provide a recommendation if required). Although it is a 3 bedroom town house I am only interested in ONE adult to share the house with. You will have full access to the entire house, this is not a room-for-rent. My current housemate is moving out only to be closer to her family/work and she will provide a personal reference if required. I am very clean and keep to myself. There are also 2 cats that live with me or I guess you could say that I live with them! Due to this, the ad is listed as pet friendly but one additional cat would be the absolute maximum.


Please note: I will not be accepting the first qualified applicant and will be very thorough and selective with my decision. I feel it is very important to find someone compatible when it comes to sharing a house.

I am listing the rental amount at $630/month. This amount includes High Speed Internet (with Netflix!) and House Insurance (mandated by the landlord) but does NOT include Gas (Enbridge), Hydro (Ottawa Hydro), or Parking (if required). Hydro and Gas would be split 50/50 (estimates below). Outdoor parking is also available from the landlord (not me) at an additional rate of $45/month (it's actually $44/month until December).


Rental Breakdown (Estimated Bills)

Base Rent: $630

Enbridge Gas: $40-$70/month (split 50/50 = $20-$35 each)

Ottawa Hydro: $40-$70/month (split 50/50 = $20-$35 each)

• These amounts are estimates only and averages based off the previous year. This is to give you an annual estimate only. Some months may be much higher, some months may be much lower (heating in the winter, over all hot water usage, a/c units, laundry volume, etc). Your estimated monthly average would be in the $670 to $700/month range (+$45 if parking is required).


Only my name would be on the physical lease and utility bills but we would be signing both a Roomers and Boarders Agreement, along with a Roommate Agreement. I will provide signed receipts for rent and bills. I'm interested in a minimum of 1 year (longer preferred but not required) with month-to-month afterwards unless we agree to commit to another year. 60 days notice must be provided by either of us in order to terminate the tenancy agreement. Last month's rent (not including bills) will be required upon signing the agreement and first month's rent will be due upon move-in date (pro-rated daily if you move in mid-month).


House details;

• 3 Bedroom

• 2 Entrances

• 1.5 Bath (1 Full large bathroom upstairs + 1 toilet/sink downstairs)

• 90% furnished.

• Fridge, Stove, Microwave, Washer/Dryer (new).

• no dishwasher

• no central air-conditioning. You can install a window unit in your bedroom and/or living room but it will affect our Ottawa Hydro bill total in the summer months. I will still be splitting the bill 50/50 as I do have a window unit in my room and would benefit from any additional a/c units.

• Unfinished Basement.

• close to pretty much every type of store, walking distance to Farmboy, Gas Station, and Bus

• small playground in front of house

• smokers welcomed but NOT in the house, ever.


Please message me here or email me for more details and to set up a viewing appointment.

address: Kingston Ave, Ottawa, ON K1Z 8L2, Canada
description:
****

Please Read the entire listing before contacting with questions. We put effort into giving you an accurate picture of the property.


Yes, it’s available ✅


****


Luxurious 2 Bedroom 2nd floor apartment located in a well-maintained and quiet owner-occupied legal triplex. Fully renovated with high-end fixtures and features that bring out classic charm and character.


Right next to Ottawa’s beautiful Experimental Farm and only a few minutes from the Civic Hospital, Westboro and Hintonburg. Lots of open park space, walking & biking trails, public transit stops and so much more right at your front door!


The newly renovated kitchen has carrera marble flooring, floor-to-ceiling subway tile and under cabinet dimmable lighting. A lovely breakfast bar and nook awaits you. A high-end Kitchenaid dishwasher, Whirlpool fridge and Maytag range are included. All accessories are an upscale matte black and brass.


The spacious living room has a media wall for a mounted television (mount supplied) and dimmable LED pot lights for cozy evening lighting.


The bathroom is brightly lit with a walk-in rain shower, brass fixtures, wall mounted faucet. There is a marble vanity and a large medicine cabinet in addition to marble flooring and floor-to-ceiling subway tile.


The two bedrooms are comfortably sized with ample lighting and electrical plugs.


There has been extensive soundproofing throughout the building. Inside the apartment, every door is solid core and all flooring contains multiple layers of an Audimute peacemaker soundproofing membrane. The building has extensive “drill & fill” cellulose between walls and ceilings. We can walk you through these treatments during a showing.


The furnace is new and has an air exchanger (keeps inside air fresh), the ducts are cleaned and the filter is changed regularly. There are new windows throughout the entire apartment.


Included is an on site pay per use laundry facility and security cameras. 1 parking spot is also available for an additional fee. Additional storage is also available.


Lease Terms


We take great pride in our property and are looking for a tenant(s) who will do the same.

July or Aug 1st occupancy available

Non-Smokers Only

Absolutely No Pets

1 year lease minimum

$1,995.00 + hydro


LIMITED IN-PERSON SHOWINGS because of Covid. A video tour can be provided with a follow-up a phone screening.

address: , Ottawa K1Z 5V3 ON, Canada
description:
*Please read everything below before messaging :) I know this is a long ad, but I’ve taken the time to include as many details as possible for those interested. Feel free to message if you have additional questions!*


I am a 30 year-old professional female looking for a roommate for the apartment I am currently in. Full-time professional females only please. The room will be available as of this fall. Let me know when you were looking to move, I’m relatively flexible.


The Room, Location, Etc:


One bedroom available in a two bedroom apartment in Westboro (near the Superstore, Richmond Rd/Kirkwood area).


UPDATE 1: The photos of the room with furniture are from a previous roommate to show scale, however my current roommate will likely be leaving/selling her desk/dresser/bed etc. so there might be a possibility of having furniture. Let me know if that's something you're interested in.


UPDATE 2: My landlord (who is great!), will be updating the shower/tub area of the bathroom with a Bath Fitter soon, so half the bathroom will be brand new (and installed quickly!)! The bathroom is already quite nice, but this a cool extra perk I thought I'd mention :)


- The room is fairly large measuring in at 11’11” x 11’2” with a large window and large closet

- The unit is on the main floor of a triplex

- The unit has one shared bathroom

- Street parking only, or if you wanted, there is a paid underground lot nearby (5 minute walk). There is no parking space available for you on the premises since I occupy the only space for the unit.

- Ideal for either someone who doesn't drive, OR works ~9-5 type of hours in order to avoid bylaw tickets during the weekdays (bylaw doesn’t patrol our street on weekends)

- 5 minute walk to Westboro bus station (OC Transpo) which connects to LRT

- 2 minute walk to Superstore

- 5 minute walk to Farm Boy

- 3 minute drive to the highway on/off ramps

- Not a far walk or drive to Wellington West (Wellington Village), Hintonburg, Tunney’s Pasture, even downtown is a quick drive down Scott Street, the parkway, Richmond Rd, or the highway

- Air conditioning (central air)!

- Hardwood floors throughout

- Stainless steel kitchen appliances (dishwasher, fridge, stove)

- Nice natural light

- Coin-operated laundry in basement of building

- There is no storage available in or outside of the unit, so someone that doesn't have a ton of belongings is ideal since you'll be limited to the space in your room. (There is a den in the unit, but I use that room in its entirety and it is not available for your use. This is reflected in the price).

- No pets please


The neighbours on the street are close-knit, friendly, and family oriented. It's a warm, safe community.


The neighbours in our building are pleasant 20-30 somethings. I've been in this unit for 6 years and I've been very happy here.


About Me:


I'm a 30 year old woman who works from home most days as I run my own successful business of over 10 years. If you’re wondering what a roommate who works from home would be like, in my case I just work quietly between my desk in my room, and on my laptop in the living room (can’t sit in the same place all day haha).


I’m tidy, friendly, responsible, respectful, financially secure, tend to keep to myself but happy to watch some TV together, I don't party or have people over very often. I’ve had a few roommates over the years and they would all describe me as being very easy to live with. I can provide references if you like.


Looking For:


Looking for a roommate who is: a professional female ideally in the same age range (late 20's early 30's) who is responsible, friendly, quiet, and respectful. Since I work from home, I’d prefer a roommate who works outside of the home in a full time position.


Looking for someone who has all of the attributes one would want in a roommate: clean and tidy, cleans up after themselves especially in the kitchen, doesn’t leave clutter around, that kind of thing. I’d like someone who is quiet and doesn't play music or TV too loudly (the sound really carries).


I like to keep the apartment pretty quiet and peaceful, I wouldn’t want people coming in and out a lot. A couple friends over once in a while is perfect, but I wouldn’t want it to be a regular hang out spot.


I'm past the drinking/party phase of my life and looking for someone in the same boat.


Ideal roommate in a word? Chill. (Please, no drama or crazies, you know who you are haha).


You would pay me $975 on the 25th of each month and this covers all costs. Of course if the expenses change considerably, I would adjust this figure. However costs have stayed pretty consistent over the years so I don’t expect this to be an issue.


Being completely financially secure and able to pay on time every month is a must, which should go without saying. I don’t mess around with this, so if $975 sounds like it could be tight for you, this won’t be a good fit.


If you're interested, send me a message with some info about yourself! I will reply to those who seem like they could potentially be a good fit and we can go from there :)


Thanks all!

address: 69 Laurel St, Ottawa, ON K1Y 3E1, Canada
description:
Newly Renovated 3-bedroom Apartment in Hintonburg: $2,400 per month plus hydro.


Located in trendy Hintonburg this 3 -bedroom apartment is a rare gem. Enjoy the convenience and lifestyle of being located steps away from Wellington street West.


This spacious 3-bedroom apartment includes a large living-dining room area and large windows throughout the apartment that allows for ample sun exposure year-round. The entire apartment is newly renovated with a brand-new kitchen with never before used Stainless Steel dishwasher, fridge, stove and microwave. Also, a completely new modern washroom with bathtub. The 3-bedroom space is ideal for a professional couple wanting extra space for a home office or can easily accommodate roommates. The building has on site laundry in newly renovated laundry room.


The area is highly walkable, scoring an 89 on the walk score index; and is walking distance from many cafes, restaurants and local grocery stores. It is the perfect destination for walks to Little Italy, China Town, Dow’s Lake and the Arboretum. We are also located walking distance from the Civic Hospital making it a great option for anyone working there. There is a communal bike rack located in the back of the apartment building. The area offers excellent access to bike trails along the Ottawa River and safe bike lanes throughout the streets making it an exciting option for cyclers (bike score of 94) The apartment includes use of 1 large garden box for those interested in gardening which has ample sunshine exposure and water access nearby. There is a shared outdoor space ideal for BBQs and outdoor dining.


Some notable local businesses in the neighbourhood include Merry diary, Bridgehead, Tooth and Nail, Happy Goat Coffee, the Third and Beyond the Pale.


The entire building is non-smoking with no pets. Please contact the property manager Brian at 613-762-9977 or rent@primeunits.com for a socially distanced showing. Parking is available at an additional cost.

The house is available August 1st.

NO smoking and NO pet please

description:
Welcome to 34 Majestic, a beautifully renovated 4 bedroom house, with a private balcony, on a large lot with all utilities included, along with high speed internet for your convenience. This house was professionally renovated in 2019 and has all the upgrades you are looking for.


Available for rent September 1.

Upstairs unit features four bedrooms with spacious master bedroom, 1 bathroom, separate open concept living/dining room and kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz counter tops with beautiful hardwood flooring throughout. Monthly rent is $3,000 all included.


Features:

- All utilities included (heat, hydro, water, gas and unlimited high speed internet).

- Snowplowing/lawn maintenance included throughout the year.

- New Kitchen stainless steel appliances (Fridge, stove, over the range hood fan and dishwasher).

- Washer and dryer.

- Central AC.

- Exclusive rights to backyard balcony with large yard.

- Shared garage.

- 2 parking spots available.

- Minutes away from Algonquin College and all amenities.

- OC Transpo routes nearby.


No pets.

Smoking indoors is prohibited.


Must provide references checks.

12 month lease required along with first and last months rent.

The master and other bedrooms are larger then expected, each, fully closeted, carpet. Washer/dryer in the Gym/Den. Wine cellar and pantry area tucked away.


Unit 2 is traditional. 3 bedroom, huge kitchen, dining, and living rooms (hardwood floor), Travertine countertop, Deep soaker tub, bidet, floor to ceiling windows. Private elevated back deck.

Out back there is so much more:

- 18x36 in-ground pool,

- In ground hot tub and an

- Fully enclosed private large yard, and


Superb neighborhood close enough to the city, yet great for outdoors fresh air, star gazing, bicycle rides etc.

2 garages everything larger then life. Driveway parking fits 9. Garage fit 2 cars plus Bike/ATV etc.

address: Freedom Private, Ottawa, ON K1G, Canada
description:
Location location location... This townhouse is great for graduates and professionals on Smyth road and Alta Vista drive! Across the street from CHEO, Ottawa General Hospital, University of Ottawa Medical School Roger Guindon Hall, Canadian Forces Health Services Centre, MD and Canadian Blood Services. It is also steps away from trainyards with tons of shopping.


Newly renovated kitchen, bathrooms and freshly painted throughout (new photos to follow). This townhouse has a spacious open concept first floor with stainless steel appliances. There is a powder (2 piece) bathroom on the first floor. The back yard is fully fenced with deck and BBQ. The second floor figures two large bedrooms and the main bathroom. It also includes the master bedroom with its own walk-in closet and 3 piece ensuite bathroom. The basement is fully finished with washer and dryer. The townhouse has central air conditioning and heating, humidifier and air exchanger.


This townhouse is suited on a quiet street with great neighbours. There is a single car garage and two parking space in the front. Ideal tenants would be medical and graduate school professionals, hospital staff. No smoking and no pets are allowed. Security/Credit and reference check will be required. The rent is $2600/month, all utilities are extra.

This is possibly the largest condo in Ottawa: 2400 sf of beautifully renovated space!

address: , K1R 6P1, Ottawa, ON
description:
Want to get ready for autumn by moving where all the action is? To move into your own place? Move in with your beau? Ditch the awful roomy? Move to the coolest of neighbourhoods? Impress your friends by being in the know for all the best restaurants and food stands in Centretown West/ Hintonburg?

This lovely, sunny, cozy 2 BR apartment is your answer! Available September 1st.

Located on the 2nd floor of a house, this place has TWO bedrooms that are pretty much the same size. No need to draw the short straw of who gets the tiny room.

Open concept kitchen, living room with south facing windows for all your sunshine needs in Ottawa’s dreary winter.

Not only do you get a great apartment, you also get your own front yard patio (not a balcony). The patio space is located on the ground level which means you can put a BBQ! Take that high-rise buildings!

Landlord lives next door, which is super convenient if Sunday eve at 8pm you have an apartment emergency. :-)

What else do you get in this unit?

· Hardwood throughout most of the unit, new carpet in one bedroom. Carpet is much nicer on the tootsies when you wake up in the morning!

· All old crappy windows replaced so you stay draft-free warm.

· Heat, water and hot water.

· A walkability index of 90 out of 100 which means you can pretty much walk anywhere you need.

· A bike score of 100 out of 100!!! Biker’s heaven!

· A transit score of 90 out of 100. Pretty dang awesome for Ottawa.

· This place is even in range of those new e-scooters -awww yeah!

· Close proximity (700m) to Lebreton Station and the new Confederation LRT Line for all your commuting needs.* (when it's running :S)

· Living a life that is far too close to delicious places such as Art-Is-In (200m), Bridgehead’s main roastery (280m), Ward 14 (240m) Peitro's Corner (110m), Pubwells (62m). Or go across the tracks to a plethora of restaurants).

· Burn all the good food off at Plant Recreation Centre (190m), the new O-Train Bike Paths, Ottawa River Bike Paths, Beaver Boxing (87m) or by walking through Chinatown, Little Italy, Hintonburg or to your downtown work or school.

What is extra?

· Hydro (aka electricity). How much is it a month? I really can’t say since I don’t know if you live by candle light and are never home or have 10 plasma TVs and never leave your apartment/ home office.

· Parking. Street parking is availble through the City.

No laundry on premises, although the previous tenant had an arrangement with the downstairs to do laundry in their unit.

Questions about pets? Let's chat. Totally cool with a goldfish, not so cool with a pit viper (Ottawa Bylaw agrees).

Message to schedule a viewing virtual or using "fun" pandemic approved socially distance measures

Any viewings will need 24h notice as we want to give the current tenant ample notice.

description:
One bedroom, one bathroom in ByWard Market


Apartment 34 A Bolton Street, Ottawa ON K1N 5A9

Located in the basement level of a character home on the quiet side of the ByWard market, this apartment has newly renovated kitchen and bathroom, hardwood floors throughout and laundry facilities on-site. Across from the Royal Canadian Mint, this spot is ideal for the urban professional who loves being where the action is — art galleries, coffee shops and exquisite bakeries, diverse restaurants, and shopping galore! Enjoy walking to the many events scheduled downtown in our nation’s capital, year-round!


Rental rate: $1199/month, plus utilities.

Total square footage (living space, not including basements): 570 sq. ft.

Outbuildings: N/A

Parking available for $150/month.

At 1921 St. Laurent Blvd, we offer seven 3 bedroom townhomes and one 2 bedroom apartment. These townhouses are located in the Southeast end of Ottawa. It is located right across the street from a public transit station and close access to the 417. Schools, shopping and restaurants are all within walking distance, making everyday life as easy as possible! You are also within a short distance to Ottawa's new LRT St.Laurent Station. This area is also close to local hospitals, including CHEO, as well as the Museum of Science and Technology. If you are looking for a place to call home in East Ottawa, you have found it! 


Location Details

What's Nearby: 

  • Public Transit
  • Highway 417
  • Elmvale Acres Shopping Mall
  • St.Laurent Shopping Centre
  • Cheo and the General Hospital 
  • Trainyards Shopping Centre
  • Museum of Science and Technology
  • St.Laurent LRT Station

address: 340 McLeod St, Ottawa, ON K2P 1A2, Canada
description:
Hideaway - 340 McLeod Street - 7th floor. Furnished South and West facing corner unit condo with one bedroom, one bright den, a large balcony and a locker. The large bright den can be either an office or easily turned into a second bedroom. The whole unit is full of sunshine, and a plus if you are plant lovers!

Furniture includes couch, bar table, coffee table, bed, mattress, in-unit laundry, TV and fully equipped kitchen (can be unfurnished if required). Utilities include everything but hydro and internet.

Building amenities include a pool, gyms, theaters, BBQ area and party rooms.

The building is centrally located in McLeod St and Bank St, and steps away from LCBO, shoppers, grocery stores and good bars and restaurants.

Move-in date is September 1 or October 1, 2020 and lease will be one year. If interested, please contact via Kijiji or sending emails to jianxia15@outlook.com to schedule a visit.

——————————————————————————————

Hideaway - 340 McLeod Street - 7e étage. Appartement lumineux (exposition Sud et Ouest) meublé comprenant une chambre, un bureau ensoleillé, un balcon et un box en sous-sol. Le bureau est suffisamment grand pour faire office de chambre. L'appartement est baigné de lumière, ce qui est un plus si vous êtes amateur de plantes !

Dans l'appartement sont fournis un canapé, une table de salon, une TV, une table haute avec deux chaises, un lit avec matelas, et une cuisine entièrement équipée.

Les charges sont incluses à l'exception de l'électricité et d'internet.

Les parties communes comprennent une piscine extérieure, une salle de sport, un cinéma, un coin barbecue, et une salle de détente.

Le bâtiment est idéalement situé à l'angle des rues Bank et McLeod, à proximité du LCBO, de Shoppers, des supermarchés, dans un quartier qui regorge d'excellents bars et restaurants.

L'appartement est disponible à partir du 1er Septembre ou Octobre 2020 pour une durée d'un an. Si vous êtes intéressés, merci de me contacter via Kijiji ou d'envoyer un email à jianxia15@outlook.com.

This wonderful duplex is undergoing full renovations this summer. Full renovations include new bedrooms and bathrooms, kitchen, and living room. To top that off, there will be other wonderful new upgrades adding large windows and bike storage. Included in the apartments for rent will be the following appliances and furniture: fridge, oven/stove, dishwasher, washer, dryer, bed, desk, and closet.


This location is perfect for a group of young professionals looking for quality living. It’s a quiet and friendly neighbourhood with all your necessities just up the street on Carling Ave. Within a 10 minute walk, you have access to the major “Queensway” bus terminal, parks, bike path, grocery stores, restaurants, shopping, and banks. Within a 10-20 minute ride, you have access to DND headquarters, Queensway Carleton Hospital, Algonquin College, Skyline Complex, Tunney’s Pasture, and 100 Constellations Dr (Ottawa Public Health). This is a great home for anyone looking for a short commute that requires public transit to get around town or to get to school.


Another great feature is that you will have professional and caring property management at your fingertips 24 hours a day.


Inquire now about this premium apartment before it is gone!

At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

Welcome to 1196 Shillington, part of our Arbor Village multi-complex Ottawa West residential community. Our recently renovated 1 bedroom apartments include hardwood and ceramic flooring, updated countertops, vanities, fixtures and appliances. These suites are ideal for students, couples, young professionals and retirees who are looking for a quiet place to call home with easy access to amenities and attractions..

1196 Shillington is steps from Ottawa's Experimental Farm where you can enjoy beautiful gardens, paths and more. The building's close proximity to Carling Ave and Merivale Rd provides for access to numerous public parks, shopping, grocery, medical facilities and schools. Highway 417 is a short drive away and public transportation is just steps from your front door.

address: 99 Range Road, Ottawa, ON, K1N 8J6
description:
Luxury Rental in Sandy Hill!

HOMESTEAD LAND HOLDINGS
THE BALMORAL - 99 RANGE ROAD
Ottawa, Ontario
613.234.6377. Call today for a tour!

Two Bedroom / Two Bath + Den available immediately
Renting for $3,295.00 month plus electricity
Parking is $130-$150 per month

For a full list of amenities, photos, videos and floor plans please visit our website:
https://www.homestead.ca/apartments/the-balmoral

The Balmoral is what you've been waiting for.
It's all in the details. Every inch of your suite has been professionally designed with convenience and luxury at the forefront. Enjoy an evening of mesmerizing views on your large balcony or entertain your guests around your island kitchen. In-suite laundry provides you with convenience and central air-conditioning provides you with the comfort you expect. The sile stone countertops, LED lighting, and four stainless steel appliances give the designer kitchens vibrancy and style, while the engineered hardwood flooring helps tie the decor together, providing you with the absolute best that Ottawa has to offer in a luxury rental suite. Suite sizes range from 765-1735 Square Feet.

Stunning Amenities
The Balmoral has it all.
As you drive up to the building, you will experience the fully manicured grounds, establishing the class and sophistication of the property. Enjoy a workout in one of your two exercise facilities. Spend an evening on the rooftop terrace enjoying the outstanding 360-degree views, along with barbecues. An indoor swimming pool and steam room are conveniently available, along with a luxurious fully-equipped social lounge, library, tiered theatre room, business centre, storage lockers, bicycle storage, and billiards room.

Security features have also been given much attention. Enjoy individual floor access in your touchscreen elevator, as well as controlled access to underground parking, serviced by a car-wash.
Take a stroll along the Rideau River or visit the vibrant downtown nightlife. With the bustling Byward Market and Parliament closeby, the options are endless.

The backyard has a fence and large wooden deck to enjoy summertime BBQs and parties.

address: 181 Maple Ln, Rockcliffe Park, ON K1M 1G6, Canada
description:
Charming two story south-facing open-concept home in Ottawa’s village of Rockliffe Park. Heritage Oak hardwood floors and brick wood-burning fireplace. Semi-finished basement provides extra storage or work space and a second half-washroom. Also makes a fine man-cave, TV room, or teenager den. Original rustic cedar bathroom with personal jacuzzi tub. This south-facing house is nestled in the midst of beautiful mature trees, including maples, white pine, cedar, walnut and lilac, with yard and garden space on all 4 sides.


The main level living room (with central fireplace and west-facing bay window) opens out to the backyard, the dining room opens up to the 2nd level landing. The kitchen’s granite counter tops, wood cabinetry and stainless steel appliances join the other 2 rooms for a fully circular living space surrounding the central staircase. The in-built garage can be accessed both from the inside and outside of the house.


The upper level contains 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a cedar storage closet. Each bedroom has windows on 3 sides. Natural Gas heating.


Centrally located ~ 5 minute drive / 15 minute bike to downtown / Parliament Hill, 2 minute walk to bus. Walking distance to 4 schools: Elmwood School, Ashbury College, Rockcliffe Park Public School and St. Brigid's School.


Perfect for a couple or a couple with 1 child (or 2 young children).


Available Sept 1 2020.

address: 301 Royal Fern Way, Gloucester, ON K1V 2K7, Canada
description: BOOK THE MOVERS FOR SEPTEMBER 8TH!!!! Spacious 3 bedrooms + 3-1/2 baths is located close to schools, shops and transit. Open-concept main level boasts 9' ceilings, a generous foyer + 2piece bath, a handy breakfast bar, gas fireplace that can be enjoyed in the living/dining rooms plus carpet-free environment with hardwood and tile flooring (Carpeted staircases and on the 2nd level hallway). S/S kitchen appliances include refrigerator, built-in dishwasher, stove (replaced 2019), exhaust hood fan and microwave oven; a full size white washer & dryer (2nd floor location). Generous master suite with walk-in closet and an ensuite with separate tub and shower. 2 nice-sized bedrooms and a full bath complete the 2nd level. Lower level family room offers many possibilities for entertaining or a quiet work space and the convenience of a 4-piece bath. Perfect. AND AND AND a 2-car garage with auto garage door opener. Central A/C. Fenced yard. Minimum 24 hours notice for viewing.... weekend viewing preferred. Schedule your showing asap. Tenant pays $2500 monthly plus: hydro, gas, water & HWT rental, grass + snow maintenace, tenant insurance pkg. Credit applications must include confirmation of employment/ recent pay stub . Minimum 1 year lease. No smoking & no cannabis. Contact: Margaret Adair, Broker; First Estate Realty Ltd at: peggyadair@1000island.net for scheduling viewing and/ or further information.

address: 890 Cahill Dr W, Ottawa, ON K1V 9A2, Canada
description: CONDO YOUR NEW ADDRESS. Impressive choice of superior finishings and a 2nd floor re-design. TWO spacious master suites, each complete with own upgraded baths.... Carpet FREE throughout.... Maple Hardwood & porcelain tiles. Snazzy quartz counter tops. S/S Kitchen Aid appliances include: 26 cu ft refrigerator w/ ice maker & waterline; gas stove with upgraded exhaust hood fan; built-in dishwasher; top-of-the-line ELECTROLUX full size front end washer and dryer. Spacious L-shaped living & dining room. Kitchen brings in lots of natural light & the centre island offers countless possibilities! ALSO INCLUDED: newer windows on the 2nd level, central vac with attachments; Central Air; a state-of-the-art in-floor heating in lower level family room and an amazing spa-esque bathroom, new high-efficiency furnace and new HWT, stunning light fixtures & pot lites thru out, plus window coverings. Get ready to embrace those hot & sunny summer days... skip the beach and scoot out your back door and you're 70 seconds to the community pool & rec centre! Location ? Minutes to downtown and there's transit at the door.Tenant pays: hydro, natural gas, wi-fi, tenant insurance pkg. Tenants to provide confirmation of employment (recent pay stub or HR letter). 1st &last month's rent on signing. NOTE: Sq Footage is approx & includes finished space.....CONTACT; Margaret Adair, Broker, First Estate Realty Ltd email: peggyadair@1000island.net

address: brittanic road, K2V 0R6, stissville, ON
description:
Brand New built 2020 large size End Unit two storey townhome feels like single home with finished basement on with good size backyard to enjoy summer! Be the first one to live in this new Two Storeys 4 bed on second floor / 3 bath townhome in Kanata south Fernbank and terry fox crossing Blackstone community and available to move in August. The main level features dining, living room, powder washroom and open concept kitchen with granite counters and ceramic tiles floor. The upper level features 4 generous size bedrooms each with a lot of closet space, full bathroom and master bedroom with ensuite double door shower and walk-in closet and convenient Laundry on the same floor. Fully finished basement features a family room and lots of storage space. This newly build house has lot of large windows for natural light and available August and comes with all appliances, garage and garage opener.

Features:

* End Unit semi detached house on big lot

* 4 bedroom on second floor

* 9 ft ceiling on the main floor

* Laundry on the second floor

* Fully finished basement with family room and a lot of storage space

* New stainless steel appliances stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave and washer, dryer

* Granite kitchen counter and Central air conditioner

* Parking for 2 cars (garage + driveway) with remote control

* Close to public school, shopping, parks and shopping.

* Available August

No Pets or Smoking.

The tenant will pay rent plus heat, hydro, water, HWT rental.

Credit check and references required

Pl contact text/call 6132206246 to book showings/questions

address: 234 Rideau St, Ottawa, ON K1N 0A9, Canada
description: Luxury apartment available for rent in the heart of downtown Ottawa. The unit comes with many upgrades and is stunningly elegant. 1 bed room, 1 wr, 1 parking and 1 locker included. Appliances included, dishwasher, fridge, stove, microwave and laundry. Lots of building amenities incl. security, exercise room, indoor pool, party room, lounge, and BBQ area. address: 315 Terravita Private, Ottawa, ON K1V, Canada
description: Newly built 1 bed. condo. Access to roof top terrace. Minutes away from airport and transit system. For more info please call or email.

address: 115 Tall Pines Private, Nepean, ON K2H 7B1, Canada
description:
FANTASTIC location and rare find! Welcome home to this lovely stacked townhouse upper unit in desirable Leslie Park neighbourhood. This well-maintained home has 2+1 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms in a very private and secure cul-de-sac.

Main floor features: Open concept living and dining room with beautiful hardwood and balcony overlooking the peaceful ravine - no rear neighbours! Enjoy the gorgeous gas fireplace in the living room for those chilly days. Spacious kitchen with plenty of cabinetry and large fridge. Main floor guest bathroom and large unique bonus room currently used as a bedroom could also make a great den or office.

Upper level features: Large master with double closets and private balcony plus second good-sized bedroom, 4pc bathroom and separate laundry room.

Minutes to public transit, Algonquin college, shopping, highway, IKEA, and Queensway Carleton Hospital. One parking spot included, second rented parking spot prepaid til December (possible to extend). Short walk to gorgeous community park including splash pad, play structures, skating rink in winter, community garden, large field and picturesque ravine. Great neighbourhood and neighbours!

Asking $1900/month rent which includes water, snow removal, landscaping. First and last month rent, plus $500 refundable safety deposit required. Please provide credit check and references upon application.

address: 315 Terravita Private, Ottawa, ON K1V, Canada
description: Brand new rental unit never lived in. With access to roof terrace. 2 bedrooms 1 bath. Minutes from airport and transit system. Not furnished 1850$ , Furnished 2100$ please call or email for more info.

address: 141 Cooper Street, Ottawa, ON, K2P 0E8
description:
The Carson, 141 Cooper St.We have vacancies available:

For September 1st Move in.
- 1 Bedroom from $1549 + Hydro.
- 2 Bedrooms from $1999 + Hydro.

For October 1st Move in.
- 1 Bedroom A. from $1499 + Hydro.
- 1 Bedroom 16. from $1549 + Hydro.

Parking is available outdoor for $200 per month/per vehicle if needed.


Make your new home with The Carson!

Located at 141 Cooper St, behind Ottawa City Hall, minutes from U of O and just off Elgin!! Amazing location!!
We have completely renovated an old hotel into beautiful new apts & a stylish building with great amenities!!

A new way of living in Ottawa is here! Community-centric living in Centretowns Golden Triangle. Be the first to experience The Carson: stylish, urban suites for the modern-day city dweller. Live amongst our collaborative community of doers and thinkers, entrepreneurs and executives, innovators and founders.

Nestled between the serenity of the Rideau Canal, and the vibrant energy of Elgin Street, The Carson offers the balance needed to navigate urban living in the twenty-first century.

Our common amenity areas are the perfect place to meet and get to know your neighbours. Available to all tenants, our luxury amenities include a brand new fully-equipped Gym, Business Centre, State-of-the-Art bike room with a wash and tuning station, Wifi Lounge, Recreation Centre, and more!

"Serious Inquiries Only"

For more rental info please call 613-235-5200 or visit our webpages

http://thecarson.ca/suites/

https://www.paramountapts.com/location/the-carson

address: 114 Viewmount Dr, Nepean, ON K2G 3B7, Canada
description:
A very nice bungalow in a mature neighborhood and in close proximity to shopping centers and Algonquian College (on a bus root). The main floor features a great L-shape living-dining room, a good size kitchen with all appliances, 3 bedrooms and a nice full bathroom. The basement features a great family room, the forth bedroom, washer/dryer room and another full bathroom. The house has been fully renovated with new floor and fresh paint.

The house has a south facing, fully fenced, and full private backyard. There is a deck and a storage room in the backyard as well.

Viewing open house:

Saturday July 25: 2:00-4:00 pm

Sunday July 26: 12:00-2:00 pm

address: 20 and 24 York Street, Ottawa, ON, K1N 1K2
description:
Key Property Details

For the finest Ottawa apartments for rent including corporate housing, furnished apartments, temporary short term housing and short term rentals, Clarendon Lanes is the place to call home.


  • York St. and Sussex Dr.: 20 and 24 York Street

  • Furnished & Unfurnished Apartments!
  • Onsite Laundry & Parking!

Property Features
  • Air Conditioning
  • Cable Ready
  • Elevator
  • Fitness Center
  • Fridge / Stove
  • Laundry Room
  • Parking
  • Pets

Detailed Property Information

Clarendon Lanes is a hidden gem, waiting to be discovered by those who appreciate comfort, style and the freedom to explore their surroundings. Choose from unfurnished or furnished apartments for rent.

Live in the heart of Ottawa's most exciting and distinguished neighbourhood, the ByWard Market, where your apartment for rent in Ottawa at Clarendon Lanes is steps from the city's best restaurants, galleries and shopping.

This modern development was completed in 2003 and offers everything you would want in a luxury apartment. Its coveted location and service-focused attitude create an inclusive neighbourhood that allows you to make the most of your days and evenings in Ottawa. Relax and unwind in the comforts of our furnished or unfurnished apartment rentals. Clarendon Lanes suites are spacious, bright, cozy and rich in architectural detail. Our suites offer you the very best in comfort and appeal with attractive granite countertops, solid maple cabinetry and central air conditioning for those warm summer nights.

In addition to unfurnished Bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom apartments for rent, we also offer short term furnished rentals. We can look after all your corporate housing, furnished apartment, temporary short term housing and short term rental needs in Ottawa.

If you're looking for something beyond the ordinary look no further than our two-storey penthouse apartments that include natural gas fireplaces for chilly Ottawa winters and a private terrace for beautiful Ottawa summers.

Unfurnished suites' rental rates do not include hydro. Furnished suites require 3 month lease. For shorter term, contact us at Sussex House.


Additional Property Information
  • Roof-top terrace
  • Controlled access
  • Underground parking
  • Fireplace (in Penthouse)
  • Granite Countertops
  • Solid Maple Cabinetry
  • Close to Restaurants
  • Close to Galleries
  • Close to Shopping
  • Close to the Parliament Buildings
  • Close to the U.S. Embassy

All Inclusive - This furnished apartment includes all utilities (heat, hot water, electricity/hydro). It is furnished with a good quality double bed and mattress in the bedroom; a daybed/sofa, desk and chair in the living room, and a dining table and chairs in the kitchen.


Newly constructed, the apartment features exposed brick walls, sliding loft-style barn doors, real hardwood floors throughout, new kitchen with stainless steel Frigidaire Gallery stove and fridge, dishwasher, and granite counter tops. The location is the best part. The apartment is a 5 minute bus ride to Carleton, 15 minute ride to U Ottawa or downtown, and not even a 5 minute walk to the heart of Bank street with lots of pubs, theatres and shops!

It is also steps away from trainyards with tons of shopping.


Newly renovated kitchen, bathrooms and freshly painted throughout (New photos to follow). This townhouse has a spacious open concept first floor with stainless steel appliances. There is a powder (2 piece) bathroom on the first floor. The back yard is fully fenced with deck and BBQ. The second floor figures two large bedrooms and the main bathroom. It also includes the master bedroom with its own walk-in closet and 3 piece ensuite bathroom. The basement is fully finished with washer and dryer. The townhouse has central air conditioning and heating, humidifier and air exchanger.


This townhouse is suited on a quiet street with great neighbours. There is a single car garage and two parking space in the front. address: 724 Dearborn Private, Ottawa K1T 0W3 ON, Canada
description:
Welcome to 724 Dearborn Private! This stunning BRAND NEW brick bungalow is located In the family friendly neighbourhood of Deerfield village. Be the first to move in and enjoy the peacefulness of this secluded area while being centrally located to Restaurants, shopping, schools, parks, the airport, Rideau Carleton Casino and so much more!


This 3 +1 bedroom bungalow is perfect for any young professionals, families or even if you’re looking to downsize! Upon entering you are greeted with gleaming hardwood floors leading you to your open concept kitchen and living space, absolutely perfect for entertaining or unwinding after a long day at work. Kitchen offers brand new stainless steal appliances, plenty of cupboard space and even a walk in pantry. If you’re a fan of a morning cup of coffee or evening drink, you will love the back deck facing no neighbours, perfect to enjoy some green space and the sounds of nature at its finest.


There are 3 bedrooms located on the main floor, one of which could be perfect for your very own home office, gym, den space or reading room. Two full baths on main floor as well with a stunning ensuite bath for the master and walk in closet. Master Bedroom backs onto green space as well!


Basement is fully finished and equipped with a great size bedroom, full bathroom, gas fireplace and walk out to the backyard facing green space. Plenty of square footage downstairs for additional living space


Washer & Dryer also located downstairs.


Available immediately, contact us today for more information or to book your private showing. This home won’t last long!


Utilities not included* Brand new high efficiency furnace will provide low heating /cooling costs throughout the year.

address: 315 Holmwood Ave, Ottawa, ON K1S 2R1, Canada
description:
Looking to transfer my lease for my furnished one-bedroom apartment, from August 15 or September 01 (or anytime in between).


About the apartment:


The apartment is located in the heart of the Glebe, at the corner of Bronson and Holmwood. It’s a corner unit with spectacular 180-degree views of the Glebe, and walking distance to shops, restaurants, cafes, LCBO, and grocery stores (Whole Foods, Metro).


Features include:


- $1545/month, excluding hydro (averages $35/month). Covered or underground parking available for an additional fee.

- Corner apartment, high floor with expansive 180-degree views of the Glebe

- Stainless steel appliances, including microwave

- Large bedroom and living room, and covered balcony

- Amazing views of the sunrise and sunset

- Plenty of natural light - from early morning to late afternoon / evening

- Bus stop (#4) right in front of your door, with easy 15-20mn commute to downtown

- 5-minute walk to Carleton University, Dow's Lake, parks and the Rideau Canal

- 8-minute walk to Lansdowne Park, with shops, restaurants, cafes, LCBO, a cinema, and grocery stores all close by

- 9-minute walk to Little Italy

- Quiet, safe neighborhood with quiet and respectful neighbors


Downsides: small kitchen, small bathroom.


Note that I'm selling all of the furniture at a huge discount to the person moving in. People willing to purchase the furniture are highly preferred. I am leaving Ottawa and would rather someone buy all of my furniture at once than get rid of it piece by piece. This also means you could move in without the hassle of furnishing the entire place (or paying for an expensive move).


Furniture for sale includes:

•	3-seater sofa

•	Coffee table and carpet

•	Side table

•	Sealy posturepedic Queen bed Eurotop (mattress + spring box)

•	One computer desks and one computer chair

•	Large dresser with mirror

•	Large chest of drawer

•	1 bedside tables

•	Blinds in bedroom

•	Kitchen table with 2 chairs + 2 benches

•	Pantry

•	Living room lamps and reading lamps

•	Patio table + 2 chairs

•	Shoe rack


Almost all of the furniture is white or off-white and in excellent condition. Most of it was purchased new about a year ago. Moving to another city so everything will be left behind.


Serious inquiries by email.

address: , Ottawa K1G0K6 ON, Canada
description:
Renting begins September 1. This is a basement apartment in Alta Vista, very nice quiet and pretty neighbourhood. The house is only a 5 minute walk to the Ottawa General/CHEO/medical school campus. The price is 950$ all inclusive. This includes: parking, internet, alt-TV, laundry, heat, hydro, water, grass cutting, snow removal.


The basement is a large open bachelor style apartment with a separate entrance, a den/furnace room, laundry room, and full bathroom. Please note that the basement does not have a kitchen. The kitchen on the main floor (directly up the stairs from the basement and attached to your entrance) is shared with one person living upstairs (myself). And I share the laundry room in the basement, but this room is separated and private from your living space (plus I will happily ask before ever coming downstairs). I'm 27, I am a research scientist at the hospital with a PhD in Neuroscience. During COVID I have been working at home so I am never onsite at the hospital. I am also a stand up comedian who performs at YukYuks, Absolute Comedy etc.


The apartment can be unfurnished or partially furnished. I have some things stored that you could use (eg. coffee tables, TV stands, lamps, futon frame, couch, desk chairs etc).


Preferably I am looking to rent to one person with no pets. Great space for young student or young professional.


If you are interested please send a message and we can discuss a virtual or in person viewing (with masks). This ad was posted July 22 - I will not start showing the place until this weekend at the earliest.

address: 1735 Frobisher Ln, Ottawa, ON K1G 3P7, Canada
description:
$1410 per month (includes utilities) - Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment (near Trainyards) 5 minute drive from downtown Ottawa. This would be a lease assignment with the lease ending on February 28, 2020 but you can renew if you would like to.


Move in on ASAP or August 1st - We have gotten a fantastic opportunity to rent a townhome near family but have loved our time here and are very sad to leave. The location is ideal, the neighbours are great (very quiet), and the renters (Osgoode Properties) have been very helpful whenever we needed their assistance and are on-site 24/7.


Other Details:


- Parking ($60 per month - we have 1 spot but if you wanted more or don't need parking that is fine)

- Internet and Cable are extra (They have a great deal through the building so it is only $45 for unlimited internet through Rogers but you would have to check if this deal is still on)

- Osgoode Properties charges extra if you want to use A/C but we have already paid for this year so it would be included for you. You would need your own A/C unit or you could buy ours if you're interested.

- Laundry is in the building basement (debit, credit or coins)

- There is a balcony and large windows that feature a river view

- Free storage unit in basement (lots of space)

- There is an outdoor pool

- Pet-Friendly building

- 2 minute drive away from Trainyards (Groceries, Gym, Shopping, Restaurants etc.,)

- 5 minute drive from Downtown and Landsdowne

- Next to a bus station and bike path

- Crime-Free Building (you will be asked to do a police check so please do not apply if you have a record)


If you have any other questions or are interested, it would be best to text me at 613 406 6909. You can also email kaitlynemcgarry@gmail.com. We are available for viewings anytime except Monday-Friday 9-5.
