address: 33 Cloverloft Ct, Stittsville, ON K2S 1T3, Canada
description:
This cheerful well-lit upper level of a duplex was recently built in an amazing location backing onto Poole Creek in Stittsville. Bright open spacious living/dining/kitchen, area with large windows which provide lots of light. This 3 bedroom home has 2 bathrooms, a large main bathroom with a tub/shower, and a washer and dryer. Master bedroom has an ensuite with a shower. The unit has a private entrance to the upper level of the home with everything on one level and is reached by only 7 steps from ground level. Backyard backs onto Poole Creek and lots of trees in the area. Separate furnace heating and ventilation for each unit. Available for August 1st or September 1st. The rent is $2,400 monthly; we estimate utilities which are not included will be around $175.00. Signing bonus- the first 2 months include unlimited internet and basic Bell fibe tv.


This home is located near many amenities such as shopping, banks, schools, bus, playgrounds, parks and more. Many are within walking distance. It is located close to the Canadian Tire Centre, Tanger Outlet Mall, Bell Sensplex, Costco, Centrum, Landmark Cinemas, Signature Centre, Hazeldean Mall and more. Walking distance to public transportation, two grocery stores, and other retail.


The home is equipped with five major appliances, plus a microwave and modern kitchen cabinets. The bedrooms have closets and large windows. There are additional closets at the entry. There is exterior parking for up to 3 large cars. Exclusive use of a storage shed.


High Speed internet available from Bell and Rogers after the first 2 months at a charge.


No smoking or pets that shed please.


Open to negotiations on the installation of an electric vehicle changer if desired.


Note unit is unfurnished. Photos are showing staging with furniture.


Call/text/email now.

Call 613-836-3005 and choose extension 7 to be connected with someone.

Email pbc@pbcsweetnam

Txt 613-836-3005

description:
Centropolis Furnished studio condo for rent at 429 Kent street.

Everything you need and more in this very cozy and central studio condo in the heart of Ottawa.

Steps from fabulous

Restaurants
Bars
Nightlife
Shopping
Parliament
TD place
VIP cineplex movie theater

The condo features hardwood floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, stainless steel appliances and ensuite laundry. Underground parking is available with most units. This building does not feature storage lockers. Enjoy beautiful Ottawa sunsets and summer BBQ’s on the spacious rooftop terrace, a common space for all residents. Centropolis Condo Ottawa also features a fitness room and bicycle storage in the lower level.

The condo is located on the 4th floor of a new 5 storey building.

Centropolis Condo is located in Centretown.
This area is conveniently nestled between Bronson St. and Elgin St. and is in close proximity to the Hwy 417. The downtown sector is 15 minutes from Ottawa International Airport, 10 minutes from the VIA Rail train station and 5 minutes from Ottawa’s Greyhound Station.

The hustle and bustle of business during the day is complemented by calm evenings. Nightlife isn’t far however, as Elgin St. and the Byward Market feature a wide array of restaurants and bars open late. Fine dining is prevalent in the area, including some of Ottawa’s best steakhouses and seafood eateries.

Cultured palettes will find thrill knowing Ottawa’s Chinatown and Little Italy are also nearby. This area also is home to many international grocery stores as well as local names. Shopping enthusiasts are close to The Rideau Centre and many boutiques. Centretown features Canadian culture as one of its main highlights. The National Arts Centre is home to some of the best performances, seminars, and exhibitions.

Email sales@urbanassetsrealtygroup.com to book a viewing

address: 500 Laurier Ave W, K1R5E1, Ottawa, ON
description:
Entire Laurier Ave W at Bay Condo for Rent with 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, 3 balconies, and 2 parking spots!!

$2,800/month


==The Unit:==

3 bedroom or 2 bedroom + den, 2 full bath (one en-suite with large shower, the other with a Jacuzzi tub/shower), THREE large, separate and private balconies to enjoy the south facing views over a quiet residential neighbourhood, 2 heated underground parking spots near the elevator and car wash station. This 8th floor, 1,175 square foot end unit is above the tree line for lovely views, no mosquitoes, short elevator rides, and still accessible by stairs! It has an open concept dining room, living room and kitchen with all new stainless steel full-sized appliances. There is AC and in-suite laundry, again full sized machines. Each balcony is private; one is accessible from the living room, one from the master bedroom and one from the second bedroom. The master bedroom also has a walk in closet. There are window ledges in every room that your plants and/or feline friends will love. You will also have access to a storage locker for your off-season tires. The condo has been professionally painted and will be professionally cleaned before you move in. Water is included but tenants are responsible for Hydro (avg $90/mth) and internet. For an extra $105/month, a monthly cleaning service can be arranged (you’d pay the cleaners directly).


==The Building:==

500 Laurier Ave W, known as tower A of The Queen Elizabeth Towers, is well managed and sought after. The building has 24 hr security, bike racks in the garage, an in-house superintendent, a salt water pool, hot tub, his & her’s saunas, gym, library, billiards room, lounge and guest suites for rent (some amenities temporarily closed due to COVID-prevention measures). Residents are primarily professionals and retirees though there are a few young families, too! The building is strictly non-smoking and pets must be carried in common areas including the halls and elevators.


==The Location:==

The Queen Elizabeth Towers are a short walk to the Lyon LRT station and Parliament Hill, steps from the Nanny Goat Hill Community Garden, the fenced Tech Wall Dog Park, Chinatown, bike paths, and all that downtown Ottawa has to offer. The location also provides easy car access to Portage Bridge, Westboro and the 417.


==Rental Details:==

Looking for a single lease with all tenants. The unit is currently owner-occupied and she has a flexible move out date of September 1st or later in the fall, based on when you’d like to move in. Minimum 1-year lease is required. Ideal tenant(s) is a non-smoker, reliable and respectful of the property including the condo corporation’s house rules. Cats and small, well-behaved, quiet dogs are welcome (though unit is currently pet-free). Proof of tenant insurance, references and credit check will be required along with first and last month’s rent. Option for the unit to include some furniture at no extra cost, including balcony furnishings (except hammock), if desired.


==Get in touch!==

If you are interested, reply with a little information about yourself and your housemate(s) including if you would prefer an in-person or virtual tour and your ideal move-in date. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to live a life of convenience in this wonderful bungalow in the sky!

Ces suites spacieuses nouvellement rénovés présentent des planchers de céramique et de bois franc, de nouveaux luminaires, une peinture de conception deux tons et bien plus encore.

Parmi les nombreuses commodités et caractéristiques recherchés, mentionnons:

  • Appareils électroménagers compris
  • Ascenseurs dans tous les édifices

  • Personnel sur place et service d'urgence 24 heures sur 24

Les Appartements Riviera sont situés à proximité des services sociaux, comme des écoles, des parcs, des centres médicaux, des restaurants et des centres dachat. Riviera représente un milieu de vie idéal, puis qu'il est situé à proximité de l'autoroute 148 et des voies de transport publiques, ce qui permet de se déplacer facilement entre Gatineau-Hull et Ottawa. Quelques minutes du centre Rideau en autobus STO#1.

Contactez-nous par téléphone ou courriel pour plus d'information ou pour prendre un rendez-vous!

***


Stop by during our open house hours or call us to book a time that fits YOUR schedule!

These spacious suites are newly renovated featuring ceramic and hardwood flooring, new lighting, designer two tone paint and much more.

Riviera Apartments is located just a short distance from Downtown Ottawa, Place du Portage and Global Affairs Canada- ideal for any government workers who are looking for a short commute. Conveniently located in the heart of Aylmer, Riviera Apartments is near the bustling Aylmer Marina and all the shopping and dining options along Rue Principale (Main Street).

Many sought-after amenities and features include:

  • Appliances included
  • Elevators at all buildings
  • Utilities included
  • On-site laundry facilities
  • Indoor and outdoor parking
  • Tennis and basketball courts
  • 2 outdoor swimming pools
  • Residents lounge
  • Secure entrances
  • On-site staff and 24 hour emergency service
  • 2 media rooms
  • 2 fitness rooms
  • Upgrades do not apply to all units

Riviera Apartmentsis conveniently surrounded by amenities such schools, parks, medical facilities, restaurants, and shopping. Riviera makes for an ideal place to live with close proximity to Highway 14, allowing for an easy commute to Gatineau - Hull and Ottawa. The Rideau Centre is a quick and easy bus ride away on STO #1. Now Youre Home.

Dining area and group-size Theatre

description:
Enjoy this cozy 1,200-square-foot rustic cabin during the fall and winter months from September 15th 2020 to May 15th 2021.


***Min 6 months / 3000$ per month: heating, hydro, phone and bell satellite additional 400$


Only 45 minutes from downtown Ottawa and within 20 minutes of Wakefield and all 3 ski hills: Mont Cascade / Edelweiss / Camp Fortune.


Situated directly on beautiful lake St-Pierre de Wakefield this secluded cabin accommodates a family of four.


Ottawa Canada.–based Storm Architecture by cdrg+RedTeam designed and built the cabin using only the simplest of materials—wood timber frame construction with beautiful BC fur—to enclose a modest 1,200 square feet.


The cabin provides an escape with a remarkable sense of place created through sophisticated spatial and compositional means.


The cabin situated atop a granite bluff to create an idyllic retreat. Imagine a natural, rustic cabin with all the modern amenities of a modern custom home that fits the lay of the land and the outdoors-oriented lifestyle.


Timber Frame Hybrid endure as ideal expressions of the harmony that can be achieved between mankind and nature. With walls of wood in its almost natural form, they bring us intimately closer to our surroundings.


A new twist on an timber frame design, this cabin has a traditional gabled roof with the modern addition of two other porch roofs on either side of the structure.


*** wood stove, in floor radiant heating

address: 118 Holmwood Avenue, K1S 5J5, Ottawa, ON
description:
All inclusive, fully furnished, 1-Bedroom plus FULL SIZE DEN luxury rental in "The Vibe" building - Ottawa's hottest location at Landsdowne Park in the Glebe. Ideally located along the beautiful Rideau Canal, with direct access to the Ottawa Farmers’ Market, Whole Foods, LCBO, Kettleman’s Bagel shop, Cineplex Cinema and multiple trendy restaurants. Glebe and Old Ottawa South shopping is just steps away along Bank Street. Just bring your personal essentials with you and everything else is taken care of.


Features:

- Comfortable, mid-century modern furnishings

- Queen size bed with All Canadian “Douglas” mattress and bed linens

- 50" SMART TV

- Fully equipped Kitchen with full-sized appliances and all you will ever need to cook up a storm!

- In-unit washer and dryer

- convertible chair for overnight guest in den


Price includes:

- Rent (including heat, water, hydro)

- Heated underground parking (which also provides underground access to Whole Foods, LCBO, Cineplex and more!)

- Storage locker conveniently located on the third floor of the condo building

- Access to condo amenities (including party room, gym and outdoor terrace with BBQs)

- Internet


Minimum lease agreement is 3 months.

Serious inquiries only. 48 hour notice required for viewing. Prospective tenants will be required to submit a credit report and rental application with references.

Call or text Vic for more info: 613-298-4620

address: 189 Harmattan Ave, K2S0G3, Stittsville, ON
description:
The Brand New three storey rear lane townhouse (1854 sqft) with 4 bedrooms 3.5 bathroom will be completed at the end of August and be available for rent September 1!

The property is located in the neighborhood of Fairwinds in Kanata, easy access to 417, very close to Tanger outlet, Canadian Tire center, Costco, Kanata Centrum shopping plaza and Bell Sensplex.

- The 9 feet main floor has one master bedroom with ensuite. Easy to be used as an office.

- 2nd floor comes with the kitchen, living/dinning and powder room. The balcony is more than 200 sqft on top of the double car garage.

- Brand new appliances (Fridge, Dishwasher, Range, Washer, and Dryer).

- Central Air conditioning.

- 3rd floor comes with three bedrooms and two bathrooms.

- Unfinished basement could be used as a storage place. The property layout is very suitable for a family or someone who prefer a quiet home office.

- Contemporary elegant Luxury Vinyl Tile in kitchen, living, laundry room, all bathrooms and main hall way, 9 feet high ceiling on the main floor.

- Quartz countertop and hardwood stairs.

Owner occupancy date is END OF AUGUST. Available for rent September 1st.

Rent price for a family is $2,100 plus utilities (electricity, water, gas and hot water tank rental). Tenants take care of the snow removal and grass cutting.

Rental application, credit check, and income check required. First month and last month deposit required.

Please email rguo1971@gmail.com for the inquiries.

address: 44 Emmerson Ave, Ottawa, ON K1Y 2L8, Canada
description:
Recently renovated ground floor 1 bedroom apartment available July 15th - $1,650.00+Hydro in the popular and trendy Westboro/Mechanicsville area!


Take a short walk to the Parkdale market, LRT, various shops and restaurants. This spacious condo feels like home - with a large bedroom, living room, dining room, eat in kitchen, in suite laundry, and separate entrance. Washer and Dryer included!


This beautiful building has a top floor exercise room and terrace with breathtaking views of the river and downtown Ottawa. Also a special treat is the garden terrace with BBQ, hobby room, carwash bay and bike room.


Need Parking? 1 indoor parking space available for rent in the secured heated parking garage at an additional cost of $100.00 per month

address: 354 Gladstone Ave, Ottawa, ON K2P 0Y8, Canada
description: Beautiful fully furnished all-inclusive space in the heart of Ottawa. Includes high speed WIFI, utilities and underground parking. Close to business district, Parliament, shops, restaurants, public transit, grocery stores and more. One bedroom, 2 full bathrooms, plus den with workspace. Walking distance to bars/restaurants, coffee shops, yoga, grocery, liquor store. Fabulous location! Perfect for couples or business travellers. Fully stocked kitchen; great for cooking and entertaining. Washer/Dryer & balcony with BBQ. Building also offers a gym and a large communal terrace with lounge chairs & BBQ's. address: 1273 Rustic Dr, Ottawa, ON K2C 2Y2, Canada
description:
OPEN HOUSE: Saturday Aug 1, 10:00 - noon.

NOTE: Visitors must wear a mask and viewings will be limited to maximum 2 people at a time.


Sleep in a little later each morning, enjoy more leisure time, spend less time commuting. Located within the greenbelt, this apartment is walking distance to Pinecrest Mall, College Square, Algonquin College, City of Ottawa Mary Pitt Centre, and a major transit station. By car, you're only 4 minutes to the Queensway on a bad traffic day.


This non-smoking, two-bedroom basement apartment in a well-maintained bungalow is located in a neighborhood where large trees are the norm. Large windows in the main living space bring in lots of light. Naturally warmer in the winter and cooler in the summer, the apartment provides comfortable living year round. The house has a front yard and private, cozy backyard where you can relax and enjoy the outdoors. The convenience of on-site laundry facilities (shared with the upstairs tenant) means less time running around. Plus, utilities (water, gas, hydro) are included!


Applicants will be required to fill out a rental application, show two pieces of government ID, agree to a credit check and criminal record check, supply references, and show proof of income.

How much smaller is the 3rd room? Its dimensions at 7'4" by 8'6". As a comparison, the regular bedrooms are 9' by 10'10". The room has been used mostly as extra storage, but also as a bedroom. As a bedroom it can fit a single bed, desk with chair, and a small closet.


Popular with students, SO - this one's for your parents! We are landlords who care. Unfortunately many properties are run by absentee landlords who rent their apartments unclean and with many things broken. This will never happen with us. We own a small number of rentals, we keep up with regular maintenance, and we know all our tenants by name. Students are our specialty and we understand university life, pressures and needs. Yes, we'll fix the toilets of course, but a good tenancy is about so much more than that. We have two children ourselves so we know how much you will worry sending them away. Mom & Dad - fear not!

Whole Foods, Cineplex Theatres, shops, restaurants and bars all minutes away. Bus stop located 100 metres from the home.


For five people rent is $760/each. If renting to six people rent is $635 each.


Home is available October 1 -with the potential for earlier.


BASEMENT:

The basement includes a large finished area and ensuite bathroom. Laundry room is accessible through the basement.


FIRST FLOOR: The first floor includes a living room, kitchen, full bathroom (purple), and two bedrooms (yellow room and large light blue). Please note the kitchen cupboard is being replaced.


SECOND FLOOR: The second floor includes a full bathroom, and three bedrooms (large white room and two light grey rooms - only one pictured, both are identical). Two light grey rooms have roof access.


Rent is ALL INCLUSIVE of all utilities -- Bell and Rogers services are available at your own cost.


Parking available as well.

address: 2000 Jasmine Crescent, Gloucester, ON K1J 8K4, Canada
description:
Welcome to this spacious, lovely seventh floor, two bedroom + one bath condo with underground parking and storage. This unit is move-in ready, freshly painted, renovated kitchen, parquet floor and plenty of windows pouring in natural light!


Work your way outside to the oversized balcony, perfect to enjoy those morning coffees or to finish the night with an evening drink. Don’t want to pay for utilities? Don’t worry… heat, electricity and water all included within your rent. Building amenities include pool, whirlpool, fitness room, laundry facility and more.


This comes with one large storage locker, one assigned parking spot plus plenty of outdoor visitor parking. The condo fees include all utilities. Sorry, Dogs lovers, the condo board has restrictions on dogs.

This complex comes with indoor pool and hot tub, indoor his-and-hers sauna, gym, party room, senior room, common area laundry and picnic area. Conveniently located close to everything. This building has 24 hour security and is wheelchair accessible.

This condo located at 2000 Jasmine in the Beacon Heights/Cardinal Heights neighbourhood of Ottawa. This neighbourhood is bordered by the Ottawa greenbelt, providing a surplus of green space for residents and outdoor lovers. Ruisseau Green’s Creek ravine area, as well as residential parks and woodlands, are spread throughout this area.


You are walking distance to movie theatres, Shoppers Drug Mart, coffee Shops, Canadian Tire, Chapters, Tim Horton, and so much more! A bus stop is right at your front door and you’re a short walk to the new LRT at Blair and easy access to downtown Ottawa.


21 mins – 21 km - from Ottawa International Airport

16 mins - 10.4 km - From Parliament Ottawa

19 mins – 22.6 km – Ottawa Amazon Warehouse

17 mins – 12.6 km – Rideau Canal Ottawa

10 mins – 4.7 km – Gloucester Costco (And a brand new upcoming Costco at a walking distance)

9 mins – 4.5 km – St-Laurent Shopping center

Main Level:

Living Room (parquet floor), Dining Room (parquet floor), Kitchen (linoleum), Principal Bedroom (parquet floor), Bedroom 2 (parquet floor) Bathroom (ceramic).

Utilities (Included in the Rent):

Hydro (Electricity), City Services (water & related charges), Hot Water, AC unit

Appliances:

Fridge, Stove/Oven, Dishwasher, over the range Microwave, 2 x window AC units, Shared Smart Card operated Laundry in Building.

To arrange a viewing appointment,

Looking for a long-term or short-term tenant to love and enjoy this beautiful home. Proof of income and credit check are required. We will perform a criminal background check on prospective applicants at our cost. NO PETS; NO SMOKERS

1665$/month – which includes: Condos fees, rent – water/heat, hydro, AC unit, underground parking and locker. (At the expense of the tenant: TV cable, internet, etc… & renter insurance is required)


Available for September 1, 2020 or sooner if need be.


Please contact me by replying to this ad.


Thank you

The Plaza Club is a fabulous 8,000 sq. fl. recreation centre located on the top level of the building podium, featuring an indoor swimming pool, sauna, fitness facilities, a private lounge in which to gather with your friends and neighbours, as well as nearly 4,500 sq. fl. of landscaped terraces on the north and south side of the Club. Here's a modern and beautiful (unfurnished) 3 bedroom end-unit townhouse for rent with finished basement in the South Nepean - Barrhaven area. Has a total of 3 washrooms (one is a powder room).

Location is ideal in beautiful Nepean at the border of Barrhaven and Nepean. Perfect location! This home is across the street from a park making it great for your kids and pets alike. There are 6 parks all within 10 minutes walking area. 7 minutes walk from St Andrew school, 4 minutes walk from Farley Mowat school, and others. 3 minutes drive to FreshCo, Tim Hortons and Starbucks (15 minute walk), 9 minutes drive from Stoneridge golf course. Minutes from the airport. This location has all the amenities you'll need nearby!

On the main floor you'll find a foyer with a lockable door leading to the garage to your left and a door leading to the powder room to your right. Further down the hall, you will find a separated dinning area. The kitchen too is separated and has dark colored cabinetry and backsplash giving it a modern look that compliments the modern appliances well. The demarcated living room features a fireplace and windows to brighten the room.

The main floor also has a walk out to a fenced backyard with deck for BBQs and lounging on summer days. Like gardening? The backyard has some gardening space should you have a green thumb, yet just enough that you won't have to do too much mowing.

Master bedroom is on the top floor. It comes equiped with an ensuite washroom that has both a shower and a tub. This room also has a walk in closet for your large collection of fashionable items.
The top floor also has two other rooms.

Laundry room is on this floor as well. This allows the person occupying the basement some privacy, should you decide to use the basement as a guest room.

Lower floor of the home has finished basement that can be used as a storage space, a family room, a guest room or a recreation room.

There's an attached garage that is big enough for a large sized car and driveway that fits two extra vehicles. There's a park a really short walk just across the street. Costco is just 4 minutes drive away.

SOUTHEAST OTTAWA APARTMENTS

address: 555 Brittany Dr, Ottawa, ON K1K 2J8, Canada
description:
This property is fully furnished and ready to move in immediately.

This very large 2 bedroom, 1.5 washroom with balcony features hardwood floors throughout the bedrooms and living room.

The dining room centers around a beautiful wooden dining table with 4 luxury chairs. The room is accented with a large Roman Numeral clock under a spotlight display and also features a beautiful hanging chandelier. The dining room has 1 foot deep shelving to accommodate a large collection of plates, glasses and bottles.

The living room is spacious and enjoys tons of natural light courtesy of wall to wall windows. Brand new luxurious leather couches and an electric powered leather recliner paired with an electric fireplace create a comfortable and luxurious atmosphere. Walkout and get fresh air on your own personal balcony with enough space for a patio table, chairs and more.

The very large master bedroom also features wall to wall windows and a stunning view combined with lots of natural light. A brand new king size bed is included with a luxurious style headboard, matching night stands, and a large matching dresser. Hang all the clothes you need in your personal walk in closet with built in shelving and hanging racks. The master bedroom also includes a personal washroom.

The second bedroom is spacious and has a double bed, side table and lamp included.

The kitchen has beautiful granite countertops on either side of the kitchen. It includes a fridge, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffeemaker, blender, and kettle. The shelves are prestocked with plates, cups, and cutlery to enjoy your meals with.

A large storage room is included in the condo with built in custom shelving. The washrooms have been kept immaculate. The entire apartment has been deep cleaned down to the last square inch. The entire apartments furniture and decorating cost well over $10,000. You need only to bring yourself and your belongings and enjoy a ready to live in home from day 1.

Close to so many amenities including shopping, restaurants, transit, parks, schools, RCMP, NRC, Montfort Hospital and College La Cité. Rent includes: High speed internet. Heat, Hydro, Water, parking. Amenities: Elevators, Exercise Centre, Outdoor Pool, Party Rom, Sauna Parking: Underground. Laundry.

description:
This beautiful house located on Craig Henry Drive in Nepean, boasts East facing large bay view window in the very large Living room and in the two lovely upstairs bedrooms. The upstairs Master Bedroom (with en-suite), main floor kitchen (with oven, large refrigerator), and family room (with fireplace and large-pane glass backdoor), face West with a fenced large backyard (large double glass door access from family room) with a couple of large trees [bonus, free apples in the fall]. Newly renovated hardwood laminate floors throughout house; roof, air-conditioning, furnace, washer and dryer all replaced recently. New windows and doors in 2017. Extra storage space in basement.


The garage has inside entry way to the mudroom which also has side door access to the house and entryway to the full semi-finished basement. Parking available for extra charge. The house is equipped with Air-Conditioning and energy efficient Ceiling Fans in nearly every room. Furniture can be provided for an additional rental or purchasing charge.


Nearby schools include Ottawa-Carleton District School Board, Sir Robert Borden High School, Briargreen and Manordale Public Schools and Greenbank Middle School as well as Algonquin College a short distance or 1 bus (82 - stop only a few feet) away. There is a convenience store and strip mall across the street and two large parks (skating rink in winter & tennis courts) within 5 minutes walking distance. The closest grocery stores are Metro [Greenbank Square], Shopper's Drug Mart and Loblaws [College Square]. Nearby coffee shops include Starbucks, Timothy's World Coffee and Starbucks. Nearby restaurants include Lorenzo's Pizzeria, Craig Henry Chinese Food Take-Out Service, Subway and Tim Hortons. Equidistant from Pinecrest and Woodroffe exits from Highway 417 and 5 minutes to the 416. Minutes walk from Greenspace and Sportsplex Recreation center.

description:

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Forest Ridge is a beautiful apartment and townhome community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, sitting on over 20 acres of beautiful parkland. Stunning amenities such as an indoor pool, basketball court, gym, outdoor pool and so much more are just a few perks of choosing Forest Ridge. When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. description:
RIVERVIEW APARTMENTS - 180 LEES AVE., OTTAWA

613 565-8000


OPEN HOUSE – MONDAY TO FRIDAY

11 AM TO 2 PM


Unit Available SEPTEMBER 01, 2020


3 BEDROOM - $1799.00


(Heat & hydro extra)

CALL TODAY AT 613 565-8000


Riverview Place is the perfect combination of convenience and affordability.

Walking distance to the University of Ottawa and you’re seconds away from the OC Transpo’s bus stops which gives riders quick and easy access to the entire city. Tenants enjoy a short walk into Ottawa’s downtown shopping and entertainment district, including Elgin Street, the Byward Market, and Centretown. Those in the community love the area’s greenery and paths along the Rideau River.

Every suite at Riverview Place is designed to give you an almost endless array of decorating options with open concept layouts in every unit. You’ll love sitting out on your private balcony with friends soaking in the stunning views of the city.

Apartment building features:


•	Clean and spacious suites with enclosed sunrooms.

•	Caring and fast response to tenant needs.

•	24-hour on-site emergency management service.

•	Overnight security guard.

•	Apartments are wired for high speed and digital cable.

•	Individual thermostats in every unit.

•	Stunning views of the city.

•	Refreshing indoor swimming pool.

•	Two indoor squash courts and tennis court on-site;

•	Convenience store on-site.

•	Pizza and Mediterranean restaurant in building;

•	Beauty salon on-site.

•	Smart Card laundry facility on-site.

•	Outdoor parking available at $55.00 per month.

•	Fridge and stove are included in the unit and the apartment is unfurnished.


Thank you.

address: 1069 Canal Woods Terrace, Ottawa, ON K1S 4H2, Canada
description:
Available for rental as soon as “immediate” or as late as September 1, 2020!

Receive a $400/month discount for the month of August!

Link to virtual walk-through and floor plan available upon request.

Fully updated 3 bedroom + den apartment for $2800/mo rent! ($700/bedroom, only a single lease will be considered but owner is ok with collecting rent separately from each tenant).

This bright, cheerful, clean and charming 4 bedroom apartment has many of the building’s original features, but also brand-new kitchen with quartz countertops, and new bathroom! Eat-in attached dining room with skylight! Large porch and back yard.

Each of the 4 bedrooms, which are located on the second floor, have sufficient room for a queen bed, or at minimum a double and a nightstand and dresser. Measurements: 8’ 10” x 9’ 10” (x 2); 12’ 6” x 12’ 6” (x 2)

-	Central water, included in rent

-	Cleaning service every 2 weeks, included in rent!

-	Utilities are charged back to the tenant but capped at $60/bedroom ($240/mo total) and includes high-speed internet!

-	Coin laundry in basement

-	Dishwasher, fridge, microwave, and stove included

One parking space is available for $75/month. Second space may be available; please inquire if required.

First/last month rent due upon lease signing.

address: 199 Slater St., Ottawa, ON K1P 0A6, Canada
description:
The condo unit is located on Slater, between Bank and Metcalfe Street on the 19th floor with an open view facing West. It is available for rent as of August 1, 2020 and onwards.

COVID-19 has transformed our way of life. An increasing risk exists with commuting on public transit and the need for convenient access to needs-based facilities becomes ever so important. Reconsider the risk of shared apartment/housing with roommates.

This condo offers a secure, private and safe place for a potential tenant to work and/or study. The condo is in the heart of Ottawa’s downtown and commercial district area, and is 5 minutes away to Parliament and 15 minutes away to University of Ottawa by foot. In addition, you will have access to clinics, pharmacies, supermarkets, coffee shops, LCBO and malls all within nearby radius. Moreover, the building is only 3 years old!

The main doors are locked at all times and can only be opened using a buzzer and/or a fob key. There are cameras on the main level as well as in the elevators.

For condo amenities, the building has an indoor group-size theatre, a game room, a hot tub, a gym, and a party room. There is free public parking in front of the building after 5 PM on weekdays and at all times on weekends. Bike parking can be included with this condo (if requested). Pets and smoking are not permitted.

The condo is currently furnished with one (1) Queen size bed, and two (2) Corporate Black Leola Chairs that can be turned each into a single bed. Furniture can be removed if preferred.


Important Rules

Due to COVID-19, some facilities listed above might be tentatively restricted or closed (i.e. public amenities and local outside-the-condo facilities). The following items will be required of the tenant before signing of the lease agreement: proof of income, reference required, credit report, minimum one (1) year lease (longer lease preferred), and first and last month rent deposit upon signing. For more information, please message me at JamesGo.815@gmail.com.

description:
Available September 1st, 2020. Private bedroom prices or entire home options.


This beautiful five bedroom town home is located in the heart of Sandy Hill less than a 5-min walk from University of Ottawa Campus and Rideau Canal.


Comes with amenities like in-suite washer/dryer, A/C, use of a 58" flat screen smart TV, high speed and unlimited internet, and Netflix access. Features a fantastic upper deck patio.


Street parking is available. On weekends, there is ample (FREE) street parking.


No smoking. No pets. No parties.


The space:

Due to the coronavirus, we’re taking extra care to thoroughly disinfect surfaces and spaces prior to move-in. The safety and well-being of our tenant's are of the utmost importance.


The Living Room:

The 58" flat screen TV is hooked up to unlimited high speed wifi internet, Netflix, and YouTube. Lounge space on two full size sofas. Also, conveniently located across the street from the Quickie Convenience store for snacks and essentials.


The Kitchen:

The kitchen features wood counter-tops, quiet soft-close white and green cabinets, stainless fridge, a stove, microwave, and Nespresso cappuccino maker. It's also stocked with cups, plates, pots, and pans and essentials you'll need to cook up a great meal.


The Bedrooms:

This home hosts FIVE (5) BEDROOMS. THREE (3) BEDROOMS with double bed and TWO (2) with twin bed. Each room is furnished with a nightstand, workspace desk, closet, and clean crisp bedding.


The Master bedroom leads to a fantastic newly built upper deck. Excellent for enjoying the summer.


The Bathrooms:

There is ONE (1) FULL BATHROOM located on second floor, with a toilet, sink and shower, and with clean, crisp towels, a quality hairdryer, and bar soap, body wash and shampoo. There is ONE (1) SMALL HALF BATHROOM located in the lower level for all your basic washroom needs.


Thank you for viewing my ad!

Available August and September 1st. 



Building Overview

Welcome to the Acadian Apartments! Situated in between Bank and O'Connor, you will find yourself walking distance to just about anything you need. 153 Nepean consists of spacious bachelors, one and two bedroom apartments with balconies, hardwood floors, large windows and beautiful views of downtown Ottawa. Professionals and students like to call the Acadian Apartments their home, as it is a short commute to schools and universities, and many downtown offices. 

Centretown offers a variety of amenities including many restaurants, trendy shops, banks and many local cafes to choose from.You are just down the street from the trendy Sparks Street Promenade and situated just a short commute to many trendy neighbourhoods like the Byward Market, the Glebe and the lively Elgin Street. You are also within walking distance to Ottawa's new LRT Parliament Station.

Our listings are only available for August or September move-ins.

You are also within walking distance to Ottawa's new LRT Parliament Station.

address: 404 Elgin St., Ottawa, ON, K2P 1N3
description:
Building Overview

Welcome to the Holbrook Apartments. This building consists of four heritage buildings all side by side located right on Elgin Street in between McLeod and Gladstone. 390, 404, 408 Elgin Street and 198 Gladstone are all two-storey walk-up heritage homes that offer a total of 34 apartment units. These buildings offer a range from bachelor apartments to 2 Bedroom units.

The Holbrook Apartments are perfectly located in the heat of the Golden Triangle. Residents can enjoy the lively, yet quiet side of Elgin Street, where you within walking distance to many restaurants, grocery stores, coffee shops, banks and much more! This building is perfect for either professionals or students as Carleton University and University of Ottawa is within minutes walking or driving distance away.

address: 40 Rue Jos-Montferrand, Gatineau, QC J8X 0C2, Canada
description:
Description


Be one of the few to experience the luxury of one of Canada's most sustainable communities. This unit is located on the second floor, facing the Chaudière Falls. It’s so close that you can hear the sound of the water flowing. It’s as peaceful as a urban location can be.


The building is centrally located, minutes from downtown Ottawa, downtown Hull (Place du Portage), the Lebreton bus station and soon to be LRT station (10 minute walk), and near Ottawa's most popular festival site, Lebreton Flats.


Select specs of the condo are as follows: - Underground parking - Bike storage and personal storage locker - 60 sq. ft balcony - Brand new stainless steel kitchen appliances (fridge, stove, and dishwasher) - Granite countertops and hardwood floor - Laundry (washer and dryer) - Access to gym and rooftop terrace


Available for rent JULY 1 2020.

description:

At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

address: 169 Holmwood Ave, Ottawa, ON K1S 2P3, Canada
description:
GLEBE AREA, HOLMWOOD AVE., near Bank Street, super large 3 bedroom apartment ground floor unit (not basement) fully private and a self contained unit, fenced in backyard, perfect for a family, professionals, serious students, working people. The apartment is large enough for four students. Rent is $2900. heat and water is included in the rent price. The whole house has brand new windows, hardwood floors, large rooms, kitchen, bath, laundry. Walk to TD place, grocery, shopping, bus, all you need is just one block away. Write to me with your email address and phone number to talk about it and to arrange a viewing of the house. call me evenings atn 613-836-7318, do not text it is Not a cell phone.

NOTE. The apartment area square footage mentioned in the AD is based only on our visual observation, we have not done any actual measurements of the rooms sizes. We had to fill in a square footage figure in the AD's blank mandatory column, therefore, a visual approximate estimate was made for this purpose. However, please take note that these are older Glebe buildings, hence all rooms are fairly large and of a very good size.
Parking is available but it is not included in the advertised rent price, we are willing to offer it to you at a very reasonable price for your convenience.

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

At 475 & 485 King Edward you can not only manage your life in upscale heritage style, but you are also right around the corner from the most dynamic section of downtown and the University of Ottawa. At 475 & 485 King Edward we offer heritage style 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom apartments. The convenience of our downtown location makes 475 & 485 King Edward an address that you will love calling home.

Located in Sandy Hill of downtown Ottawa, just a few blocks from the Rideau Canal, young professionals and adults are drawn to the area because of its easy access to the most exciting attractions in town. Students love the building because of its location just down the street from the University of Ottawa and minutes from the ByWard Market, home to a variety of restaurants, cafes, boutiques, and pubs.

Come visit us at 475 & 485 King Edward and see how exciting downtown life can be!

What's Nearby:

  • University of Ottawa
  • Rideau Centre
  • Monfort Hospital
  • Loblaws Superstore
  • ByWard Market
  • Strathcona Park
  • OC Transpo

Students love the building because of its location just down the street from the University of Ottawa and minutes from the ByWard Market, home to a variety of restaurants, cafes, boutiques, and pubs.

Come visit us at 475 & 485 King Edward and see how exciting downtown life can be!

What's Nearby:

  • University of Ottawa
  • Rideau Centre
  • Monfort Hospital
  • Loblaws Superstore
  • ByWard Market

  • OC Transpo

Located in a quiet neighbourhood, Avalon Park provides the perfect place for young families, working professionals and seniors to call home. SOUTHEAST OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Young professionals, families and mature adults love everything Avalon Park offers:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments, fitness facility, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, newly renovated kitchens with three appliances, and an ideal location close to public transportation and the Queensway. Avalon Park has it all, location, convenience and high-end amenities.

Whether you love to have friends over, host play dates for your kids or view your home as your own private sanctuary, we have a floor plan that's perfect for you. Newly-renovated kitchens, well-designed bathrooms with ceramic flooring and professionally-designed lobby and common areas are just a few of the features you'll love to come home to.

Avalon Park is also all about location. We're just minutes from Elmvale Acres Shopping Centre and St. Laurent Shopping Centre, which includes numerous restaurants, the Ottawa Public Library, coffee shops, and much more!

description:
Open House Hours:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options.  

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Situated in the central west end of Ottawa and in walking distance to the beach, Britannia Parkside offers everything you desire. From updated kitchens and bathrooms, refinished hardwood floors, upgraded common areas and a fresh exterior to the convenience of nearby amenities, you will be proud to call Britannia Parkside your new home!

OTTAWA WEST APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Britannia Beach neighbourhood, Britannia Parkside offers newly updated bachelor apartments, one bedroom apartments, two bedroom apartments and three bedroom apartments. Our residents can enjoy scenic views of the Ottawa River and Gatineau Hills from their doorsteps, walk over to Britannia Beach for a relaxing day under the sun, or take a stroll on the extensive biking and hiking trails just steps away.

Our excellent Britannia Beach neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Bayshore Shopping Centre, Coliseum Movie Theatre, Farm Boy and more popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Whatever your desire is, Britannia Parkside is the perfect place to call home!

address: 1040 Hollington Street, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 8C5
description:
Open House Hours:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options. 

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to 1030-1040 Hollington, offering modern home comforts in a ideal Ottawa West neighbourhood. This building offers spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments, which include hardwood and ceramic flooring, along with new vanities and fixtures. These suites have been sought after by young professionals, couples, small families, students and retirees who are all looking for the convenience of city life with the comforts of home.

Arbor Village is located along the edges of Ottawa's scenic Experimental Farm. Residents at Hollington can enjoy the farm's exceptional gardens, as well as the walking and biking trails. It's convenient location to Ottawa's popular Carling Ave and Merivale Rd is ideal due to the numerous public parks, shopping options, restaurants, grocery stores, medical facilities and schools. Nearby public transportation and Highway 417 make commuting to work or school easy.

A beautiful walk or short drive can take you to the Rideau Canal, where you will find scenic views and trails, as well as a selection of restaurants. Students are attracted to the village's close proximity to the acclaimed Carleton University and Algonquin College.

What's Nearby:

  • Ottawa Civic Hospital
  • Westgate Shopping Centre
  • Hampton Park Plaza
  • Carleton University
  • Algonquin College
  • Sunlife Financial Building
  • OC Transpo
  • Alexander Community Centre
  • Highway 417

Welcome to 57 Bayswater in Hintonburg, Ottawa! Nestled in the centre of Hintonburg, our trendy and creative community is home to students, professionals and families who enjoy being close to all the opportunities Hintonburg has to offer!

HINTONBURG OTTAWA APARTMENTS

In addition to a great neighbourhood, we offer:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and two bedroom apartments, gorgeous views from private balconies, laminate and ceramic flooring throughout, on-site laundry and fitness facility and easy access to public transportation and biking trails. All of these features and a winning location in the middle of vibrant neighbourhood make 57 Bayswater the perfect place to live.

Our spacious apartments offer the right fit for any lifestyle, whether you're a college student attending Algonquin College, a professional who works in the downtown core, or a family that enjoys living in a dynamic neighbourhood close to numerous parks and cultural outlets.

Every one of our apartments holds the high-end amenities you've come to expect from city living. Our apartments are outfitted with hardwood, laminate and ceramic tile throughout, giving each layout a modern feel. The views from each unit's private balcony are breathtaking.

Call 57 Bayswater at 613-518-1308 today and set up a tour!

Welcome to 235 Charlotte located in the heart of Sandy Hill, one of Ottawa's trendiest neighbourhoods! Not only will you be living in comfort at this newly renovated neo-Victorian styled building, but you are steps away from the most exciting amenities around town. This location is ideal because of the clean and upscale heritage-style bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom apartments. 

Located in Sandy Hill, right along the banks of the historic and beautiful Rideau River, this peaceful location has been discovered by students and young professionals. 235 Charlotte is a convenient walk to the internationally-acclaimed University of Ottawa, and the ByWard Market. Museums, cafes, and boutiques are all a part of what makes the ByWard Market a trendy destination. The market's restaurants, pubs and nightclubs provide a variety of international cuisine, social excitement and late night dancing and music.

Our quiet, downtown Ottawa apartments are distinguishable by our convenient location that you will be proud to call home. 

180 Beausoleil is located in the trendy and bustling North Sandy Hill/Rideau Centre neighbourhood of downtown Ottawa. We are just a few minutes walk from the beautiful Rideau River, the acclaimed University of Ottawa, and Ottawa's well-known Byward Market and Rideau Centre. Enjoy a variety of nearby amenities including museums, cafes, restaurants, shops, boutiques, and pubs.

Come visit us at 180 Beausoleil and you'll discover how enticing downtown life can be.

At Artista Flats we pride ourselves in providing everything the university student or young professional may need. Featuring renovated and pet friendly one-bedroom floor plan designs, Artista Flats is a place you'll be proud to call home.

Sitting a stroll away from the ultra-trendy Glebe and Elgin St area, Artista Flats is connected to businesses, government centres, schools, outdoor recreation, shopping, dining and entertainment. Relax in your spacious apartment with private balcony, floors above Gloucester and experience the satisfaction and convenience of living at 860 Blackthorne in Ottawa, ON! Ideally located near Highway 417 and Aviation Parkway, 860 Blackthorne offers not only easy access around town but to the big city delights of Ottawa as well.

GLOUCESTER OTTAWA APARTMENTS

In addition to a great neighbourhood we also offer:

Newly renovated apartments with laminate flooring, modern kitchen cabinets, stainless steel appliances including dishwashers, private balconies and dazzling views of the city. Take in the beautiful scenery with several nearby parks and walking paths or enjoy the many nearby entertainment venues.

When you make your home at 860 Blackthorne, you gain access to all of the dining, shopping and entertainment choices Gloucester has to offer. We have five parks within minutes of our front entrance, several shopping malls to select from and even an outdoor ice skating rink down the road.

description:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options.  

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

Our pet friendly and spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments were recently upgraded to include, ceramic tiling in the bathroom and kitchen, hardwood in the living room and bedroom, new countertops, vanities, fixtures, lighting and appliances.

address: 1401 Prince of Wales Drive, Ottawa, ON, K2C 3J8
description:
We are looking for an energetic, self motivated, handy, serivce oriented person to join our Paramount Property Team as a live in superintendent.

Paramount Property is a family run business celebrating 30 years of service this year and we are looking for a new member to join!!

POSITION:
Live-In Building Superintendent
Full-time position commencing as soon as possible
Rate of Pay $26,000.00 - $30,000/ year, apartment provided and utilities covered, basic cable and parking also included.
Health benefits after 3 months.
40 Hours per week

Job Description

To perform all Superintendent duties for high-rise apartment building. The position is responsible for all repairs assigned by the Property Manager.

These tasks include:
Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on heating, cooling and ventilation systems, Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on plumbing systems, Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on electrical systems, Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on appliances, Paint, Repair drywall, Perform routine maintenance jobs and repairs, Work with minimal supervision

Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time Days, Rotating On Call/ Weekend schedules- All work on the 1st of the month!

Work Conditions and Physical Capabilities: Work under pressure, Physically demanding, Bending, crouching, kneeling
MUST HAVE OWN SET OF TOOLS & Safety footwear. Uniforms & coats provided

If you feel that this is a position for you we would love to meet with you.
Contact us via kijiji or email your resume directly to us at pow3@paramountapts.com
Criminal Background check will be conducted.

address: 199  Slater Street, Ottawa, ON, K1P 0C8
description:
Comfortable, furnished one bedroom studio on the 21th floor of the well-located 199 Slater condo building. The building This gorgeous building with its striking, mid-century modern look combines condo apartments with the sought-after Alt Hotel and its street-level bar and high-end foodie take-out. The condo features a 5th floor outdoor terrace with downtown views, and the condo's amenities include a gym, a theatre room, a banquet room and lounge, an outdoor summer hot tub, and a billiards room. It has clean, carpeted hallways and two fast, big elevators. The apartment This apartment is a condominium unit (not a hotel suite) located high above the street on the 21floor. It has a wide south view, a decent-sized bedroom, two closets, nice big windows, a nice bathroom with glass-enclosed shower, and comes fully equipped with washer-dryer, microwave, fridge, stove, and dishwasher, plus bike parking and storage locker. It is tastefully painted, decorated, and well-furnished with a double bed, table and chairs, couch, practical living room furniture including a fold-up coffee table, flat screen TV, and fully equipped (kitchenware, pots and pans, linens, coffee maker, kettle, iron and ironing board, good curtains). The apartment is perfect for a single person or a couple. The location If you've always wanted or need to be downtown, this is a great place to be. The condo is steps away from Bank and Sparks Streets. Within your block, there is a Starbucks, a bubble tea place, a bookstore, a sushi place, a Bridgehead, a Think Lunch, a Caribbean eatery and a Tim Horton. Within the next block you have a Shoppers Drug Mart, Eggspectation Restaurant for brunch, the Royal Oak pub, the Blurry Pixel, a bakery with good bread and croissants, and the World Exchange Plaza. You are within a few blocks of two grocery stores (Sobeys [with beer] and Massine's Independent Grocer), two LCBO's, restaurants, shops of all kinds, bars and clubs, and much much more. And within a 12-minute walk, you have the Byward Market, Rideau Street, Rideau Centre, University of Ottawa, DND, the NAC, and all of downtown. Transport The building is steps away from the subway (Parliament Station, to open November 2018). Frequent bus service on Bank Street (OC Transpo) and Wellington Street (OC Transpo and STO). Bank Street Transitway Station across the street (until the subway opens). If you have a car, parking may be rented separately or nearby. Rent Your rent includes everything: internet, hydro, heat, water. You only pay the rent: $1,800 /month. Non-smokers, no pets. References required, first and last month rent deposit upon signing. Minimum 1 Year.



Building Overview

Downtown lifestyle in the luxurious Slater condo building.Furnished Studio21stfloor of the new luxury building the slater. Brand new stainless steel appliances and quartz counter tops. Building amenities include a party room, gym, games room, theatre room and hot tub. Locker included and no parking with this unit.

1-year lease

$1700.00 +Hydro.

The Slater offers residents the opportunity to live, work and play right in their own back yard. Located in the heart of downtown Ottawa, in the thriving Business District, and just a few blocks from the Parliamentary Precinct and Parliament Hill, The Slater is also within short walking distance of great shopping destinations, including the Rideau Centre and Ottawa's renowned ByWard Market.

Located in Sandy Hill of downtown Ottawa, just a few blocks from the Rideau Canal, young professionals and adults are drawn to the area because of its easy access to the most exciting attractions in town. Students love the building because of its location just down the street from the University of Ottawa and minutes from the ByWard Market, home to a variety of restaurants, cafes, boutiques, and pubs.

Come visit us at 475 & 485 King Edward and see how exciting downtown life can be!

description:
$1410 per month (includes utilities) - Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment (near trainyards) 5 minutes from downtown Ottawa. This would be a lease assignment with the lease ending on February 28, 2020 but you can renew if you would like to.


Move in ASAP (currently empty): We have gotten a fantastic opportunity to rent a townhome near family but have loved our time here and are very sad to leave. The location is ideal and the neighbours are great.


Other Details:


- Parking ($60 extra per month - we have 1 spot but if you wanted more or don't need parking that is a possibility too)

- Internet and Cable are extra (we only have internet but they have a great deal through the building so it is only $45 for unlimited but you would have to check if this deal is still on)

- The renter charges extra if you want to use A/C but we have already paid for this year so it would be included for you. You would need your own A/C unit or you could buy ours if you're interested.

- Laundry is in the building basement (debit, credit or coins)

- There is a balcony and large windows that feature a river view

- There is an outdoor pool

- Pet-Friendly building

- 5 minutes from Downtown and Landsdowne

- Next to a bus station

- Next to a bike path

- Crime-Free Building (you will be asked to do a police check - please do not apply if you have a record as it will be declined by the building)

address: 232 Cooper St, Ottawa, ON K2P 0G4, Canada
description:
Well maintained building in Downtown Ottawa. Cooper Apartments in Ottawa is a great location for residents who want to live directly in the City, close to Downtown core. We’re a walker’s paradise with an awesome Walk score rating!

Our units have great features like hardwood and ceramic flooring, are internet and cable ready, and water and heat are included in rent.

With so many amenities in walking distance, you will not have to travel far for your daily and entertainment needs!

Do your weekend shopping at the Rideau Center- a short 7 mins walk away or stay active at Rideau Canal Parkway- a quick walk down the street.

Our apartment rental units are a great opportunity for professionals who work at Parliament Hill or Ottawa City Hall, which is a short distance from our address. Students will love the close proximity to University of Ottawa and the minutes commute to the Downtown Core. Getting around is easy with several transit stops along Elgin or Metcalfe Street.

If your looking for the ultimate in Ottawa Urban Living, don’t miss out on Our Cooper Apartment Availabilities!

Please note only 1-year leases required.

Call or email us today, we have non -contact options available for tours and signing and are looking forward to working with you.


Also 1 Bedroom plus Den available for $1495.

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to Westboro one of Ottawa's most prestigious areas, where stunning modern touches blend seamlessly in a beautiful historic neighbourhood. At WEST236 residents will find striking views of the Ottawa River from private balconies, as well as premium finishes throughout every element of their new home.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

Located in one of the most sought-after neighbourhoods in Ottawa, WEST236 is the perfect combination of space, luxury and convenience. These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Westboro Village offers some of the best shopping, dining and neighbourhood amenities that can be found in the Capital region. Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. Enjoy the summer sunshine at any number of patios within walking distance, or venture to popular Westboro Beach. Whatever lifestyle you enjoy, at WEST236 there is a suite for every need.

address: 381 Churchill Ave N, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 5C4
description:
Welcome to the charming and spacious 381 Churchill, located in one of Ottawa's most sought after neighbourhoods, Westboro. This quaint building is tucked right off the main street of Richmond Road, where you can find incredible restaurants and various shopping options all within steps of your front door. The units feature unique heritage touches, plenty of natural light and fully updated finishes, making them the perfect place to call home.

Residents will love the dining options nearby. Explore local favourites like Baker Street Café, Pure Kitchen, Oh So Good and so much more! If you enjoy an active lifestyle, 381 Churchill offers plenty of surrounding gyms and fitness classes, as well as nearby bike and walking paths along the Ottawa River.

Come discover how vibrant Westboro living can be, at 381 Churchill!

Unit Features:

  • Recently renovated
  • Spacious units
  • Kitchen appliances
  • On-site laundry facilities

What's Nearby:

  • Real Canadian Superstore
  • LCBO
  • Lululemon
  • Greco Fitness
  • Pure Yoga
  • Starbucks
  • The Ottawa Farmers' Market
  • Nepean High School
  • Westboro Beach
  • Maplelawn Garden

Utilities:

Heat and water are included in the rental price. Hydro extra.

For more information or to book a viewing, please call or email!

*E&OE. Pricing subject to change and finishings may vary, contact Customer Care Coordinator for more info

address: 60 Cormier, Aylmer, QC, J9H 6B4
description:
Work comfortably at home in this renovated apartment and stay close to many stores and restaurants.
Please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options.

These spacious suites are newly renovated featuring ceramic and hardwood flooring, new lighting, designer two tone paint and much more.

Riviera Apartments is located just a short distance from Downtown Ottawa, Place du Portage and Global Affairs Canada- ideal for any government workers who are looking for a short commute. Conveniently located in the heart of Aylmer, Riviera Apartments is near the bustling Aylmer Marina and all the shopping and dining options along Rue Principale (Main Street).

Many sought-after amenities and features include:

  • Appliances included
  • Elevators at all buildings
  • Utilities included
  • On-site laundry facilities
  • Indoor and outdoor parking
  • Tennis and basketball court
  • 2 outdoor swimming pools
  • Residents lounge
  • Secure entrances
  • On-site staff and 24 hour emergency service
  • 2 media rooms
  • 2 fitness rooms
  • Upgrades do not apply to all units

Riviera Apartmentsis conveniently surrounded by amenities such schools, parks, medical facilities, restaurants, and shopping. Riviera makes for an ideal place to live with close proximity to Highway 14, allowing for an easy commute to Gatineau - Hull and Ottawa. The Rideau Centre is a quick and easy bus ride away on STO #1. Now Youre Home.

For more information, or to book a viewing please call or email!

*E. & O.E. Pricing subject to change and finishings may vary, contact Customer Care Coordinator for more info

**

Veuillez nous contacter pour des options de visites virtuelles et préenregistrées.

Les Appartements Rivieras sont situés à une courte distance du centre-ville d'Ottawa et du complexe Place du Portage - idéale pour les professionnels qui veulent un court trajet au travail. Grâce à leur emplacement pratique en plein coeur d'Aylmer, les Appartements Riviera sont procheà la Marina d'Aylmer et lesboutiques et restaurants tout le long de la rue Principale.

Ces suites spacieuses nouvellement rénovés présentent des planchers de céramique et de bois franc, de nouveaux luminaires, une peinture de conception deux tons et bien plus encore.

Parmi les nombreuses commodités et caractéristiques recherchés, mentionnons:

  • Appareils électroménagers compris
  • Ascenseurs dans tous les édifices
  • Services publiques compris
  • Buanderie sur place
  • Stationnement intérieur et extérieur
  • Terrains de tennis et de basketball
  • Deux piscines extérieures
  • Salon l'intention des résidents
  • Entrées sécurisées
  • Personnel sur place et service d'urgence 24 heures sur 24

Les Appartements Riviera sont situés à proximité des services sociaux, comme des écoles, des parcs, des centres médicaux, des restaurants et des centres dachat. Riviera représente un milieu de vie idéal, puis qu'il est situé à proximité de l'autoroute 148 et des voies de transport publiques, ce qui permet de se déplacer facilement entre Gatineau-Hull et Ottawa. Quelques minutes du centre Rideau en autobus STO#1.

Contactez-nous par téléphone ou courriel pour plus d'information ou pour prendre un rendez-vous!

address: 1750 Dorset Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1H 5T8
description:
Professionally managed by Attaché - TMS (Established 1979)

Gorgeous 4 bedroom home in desirable Playfair Park. Granite counter tops and Cherry cabinetry highlight throughout. Close to schools, parks, shopping and transit. Rear yard is perfect for summer entertaining. Surrounded by mature trees, moments from scenic bicycle paths in a family neighbourhood. Must See

Walk Score 49, Transit Score 43, Bike Score 66

Available: July 1, 2020 @ $2,995/Month Plus Utilities

Monthly rent with Snow Removal and Lawn Cutting services is $3395/Month or $2995/Month without Snow removal and Lawn Cutting.

1750 Dorset Drive, Ottawa, On, K1H 5T8

Main Level:
Living room (Hardwood) with Gas fireplace, Dining room (Hardwood), Kitchen with dinette (Hardwood), Family Room (Hardwood), 2 pc. Powder room (ceramic).

Second Level:Principal Bedroom (Hardwood) with 3 pc. ensuite Bathroom, Bedroom 2 (Hardwood), Bedroom 3 (Hardwood), Bedroom 4 (Hardwood), 4 pc. Bathroom (Ceramic).

Lower Level:
Recreation Room, Laundry, Workshop, Storage, Furnace and utility room.

Tenants costs (Utilities & Others):
Gas (Heat), Hydro (Electricity), City Services (water & related charges), Hot Water Tank Rental, Internet, Telephone, Television (cable), Alarm (security) monitoring (optional), Tenants Insurance (Required);

Appliances:
Fridge, Stove/Oven, Dishwasher, Microwave (OTR), Washer, and Dryer.

Highlights:
Single Car garage with remote door opener, Seasonal Yard, C/A Conditioning, Patio, Fenced Yard.

NO PETS; NO SMOKERS PLEASE

To arrange a viewing appointment, please call Attaché - TMS at 613-727-1400, any weekday between 8:30 a.m. and 4:30 p.m. Appointments may be booked during the day, early evening or on Saturdays, but all must be booked during office hours.

To see other great options in your desired area, please click View Web Site on the right hand side in Poster Contact Information, or search Attaché - TMS in the Kijiji search bar above.

address: 390  Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON, K1L 8H1
description:
Desirable luxury apartments and townhomes are available at Chateau Janeville, located minutes from downtown Ottawa. Choose from three bedroom townhomes or one and two bedroom apartments. Our renovated units come with a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, hardwood, carpeting and laminate floor options and sheer curtains. Townhouses have a wood-burning fireplace, a washer and a dryer.

Additional features include:

- Balcony

- In-suite storage

- Heated outdoor pool, propane barbecue area at poolside, fully equipped gym, social room

Advertised rental rates represent the lowest price available and may vary from unit to unit.

Professionally managed by Shelter Canadian Properties Limited.


Location Details

Chateau Janeville is located on the south side of Montreal Road, between Lafontaine Avenue and Ducharme Boulevard, approximately four kilometres from the Parliament Buildings. The property is within easy walking distance of rapid transit and is also located close to the St. Laurent Shopping Centre.

description:
Open House Hours:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options.  

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Forest Ridge is a beautiful apartment and townhome community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, sitting on over 20 acres of beautiful parkland. Stunning amenities such as an indoor pool, basketball court, gym, outdoor pool and so much more are just a few perks of choosing Forest Ridge. When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

Welcome to 57 Bayswater in Hintonburg, Ottawa! Nestled in the centre of Hintonburg, our trendy and creative community is home to students, professionals and families who enjoy being close to all the opportunities Hintonburg has to offer!

HINTONBURG OTTAWA APARTMENTS

In addition to a great neighbourhood, we offer:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and two bedroom apartments, gorgeous views from private balconies, laminate and ceramic flooring throughout, on-site laundry and fitness facility and easy access to public transportation and biking trails. All of these features and a winning location in the middle of vibrant neighbourhood make 57 Bayswater the perfect place to live.

Our spacious apartments offer the right fit for any lifestyle, whether you're a college student attending Algonquin College, a professional who works in the downtown core, or a family that enjoys living in a dynamic neighbourhood close to numerous parks and cultural outlets.

Every one of our apartments holds the high-end amenities you've come to expect from city living. Our apartments are outfitted with hardwood, laminate and ceramic tile throughout, giving each layout a modern feel. The views from each unit's private balcony are breathtaking.

Call 57 Bayswater at 613-518-1308 today and set up a tour!

address: 179 Harmattan Ave, Stittsville, ON K2S 0G4, Canada
description:
NEW townhouse 4 Bdrm 4 Bath with Patio & 2 car Garage for rent


Located in the inner community street. Street noise from Maple Grove Road is blocked by another row of houses.


The property is located in the neighborhood of Fairwinds in Kanata, easy access to highway 417, walking distance to Tanger outlet, Canadian Tire center, Costco, Food Basics, Kanata Centrum, and many stores along Hazeldean Rd. Only a few minutes drive to DND new campus. In terms of public transit, the #62 and #162 bus service the neighbourhoods, and the #61 is also within walking distance. The "Rush Hour"

service also includes the #261 and #263.


This is a 2000 sqrt home, newly built and completed in August of 2020 in

the new Mattamy development of "Fairwinds". There are 4 bedrooms, and 3.5

bathrooms. All rooms are in HARD FLOOR.


The ground floor has a guest bedroom plus an

ensuite washroom. On this level you will find the laundry facilities. Guest bedroom has been fully equipped with insulation on ALL walls and ceiling to BARRIER possible NOISE from the laundry room and 2nd level.


The main (2nd) level of the townhome has a living room, a

powder room/bath, and a kitchen/dining room with access to a large patio more than 200 sqft

situated on top of the garage.


The third level contains the master bedroom and two other smaller bedrooms.

One shared bathroom between the two smaller bedrooms. The master

bedroom with a walk-in closet has an ensuite bathroom with LVT flooring.


The basement is unfinished.

The townhome has a small yard in the front with minimal yard maintenance.

NO yard in the back (instead allocating the space to the garage and patio).


For perspective tenants with children, there are nearby neighborhood parks,

some of which have water 'features' for children during the summer.

No pets is preferred. That being said it's not a 'hard no' if you have a pet,

but please let us know what type of pet or pets you have.


Owner occupancy date is END OF AUGUST. Available for rent September 1st. No Showings at this moment since the builder is completing the construction. Rent price for a single family is $2,150 plus internet and utilities (electricity, water, gas and hot water tank rental). Tenants take care of the snow removal and grass cutting. Price applies to a single family only. No pets please. Call 613-663-8308 for more information or email fairwinds4rent@gmail.com for the inquiries.


179 HARMATTAN AVE

address: 199 Slater St., K1P 0C8, Ottawa, ON
description:
Comfortable, furnished one bedroom studio available Sept. 1st on the 12th floor of the well-located 199 Slater condo building.


The building

This gorgeous building with its striking, mid-century modern look combines condo apartments with the sought-after Alt Hotel and its street-level bar and high-end foodie take-out. The condo features a 5th floor outdoor terrace with downtown views, and the condo’s amenities include a gym, a theatre room, a banquet room and lounge, an outdoor summer hot tub, and a billiards room. It has clean, carpeted hallways and two fast, big elevators.


The apartment

This apartment is a condominium unit (not a hotel suite) located high above the street on the 12th floor. It has a balcony with a wide south view, a decent-sized bedroom, two closets, nice big windows, a nice bathroom with glass-enclosed shower, and comes fully equipped with washer-dryer, microwave, fridge, stove, and dishwasher, plus bike parking and storage locker. It is tastefully painted, decorated, and well-furnished with a double bed, table and chairs, couch, practical living room furniture including a fold-up coffee table, flat screen TV, and fully equipped (kitchenware, pots and pans, linens, coffee maker, kettle, iron and ironing board, good curtains). The apartment is perfect for a single person or a couple. Ideal for Military or Diplomats too.


The location

If you’ve always wanted or need to be downtown, this is a great place to be. The condo is steps away from Bank and Sparks Streets. Within your block, there is a Starbucks, a bubble tea place, a bookstore, a sushi place, a Bridgehead, a Think Lunch, the legendary Sansotei Ramen, and a Tim Horton. Within the next block you have a Shoppers Drug Mart, Eggspectation Restaurant for brunch, the Royal Oak pub, a bakery with good bread and croissants, and the World Exchange Plaza. You are within a few blocks of two grocery stores (the new Farm Boy [with beer] and Massine’s Independent Grocer), two LCBO’s, restaurants, shops of all kinds, bars and clubs, and much much more. And within a 12-minute walk, you have the Byward Market, Rideau Street, Rideau Centre, University of Ottawa, DND, the NAC, and all of downtown.


Transport

The building is steps away from the subway (Parliament Station). Frequent bus service on Bank Street (OC Transpo) and Wellington Street (OC Transpo and STO). If you have a car, parking may be rented separately or nearby.


Rent

Your rent includes everything: internet, hydro, heat, water. You only pay the rent: $1,800/month. Non-smokers, no pets. References required, first and last month rent deposit upon signing. Minimum lease 12 months - longer term available and preferred.
