description:
Beautiful two-bedroom, fully furnished apartment, located close to the Byward Market. This unit has a unique charm due to its construction dating back over 100 years but still offers the commodity of a newer home with modern kitchen and bathroom. It offers views of the Byward Market, Parliament, National Gallery and more. You will have access to a locked storage area and access to a coin-operated laundry facility to be shared with other tenants in the building. The tenant will be responsible for the units hydro and natural gas (heating is included). You don't want to miss this opportunity!

Joli appartement de deux chambres, complètement meublé, situé à quelques pas du Marché By. L'appartement possède un cachet unique dû à sa construction datant de plus de 100 ans mais offrant la commodité des nouvelles maisons avec sa cuisine et salle de bain rénovées. Il offre une vue sur le Marché, le Parlement, le Musée des beaux-arts et plus encore. Vous aurez un espace de rangement au sous-sol sous clé ainsi qu'un accès à la buanderie payante, partagée avec les autres locataires de l'édifice. Le locataire est responsable de son hydro et du gaz naturel (le chauffage est inclu). Une occasion à ne pas manquer!

The stunning interior features upgrades throughout with pot lights in every room, gleaming hardwood floors, an electric fireplace, high end furnishings, central air, in-floor heating, an open concept layout.

The dream kitchen includes a custom backsplash, a large center island, granite countertops and three stainless steel appliances (fridge, stove and dishwasher).

The state of the art bathroom boasts double sinks with custom finishes that extend to the ensuite bath that features a glass spa shower.

The bedrooms include one queen and one king bed with large windows, plenty of closet space and hardwood floors.

The exterior is an excellent area for entertaining with a private deck to enjoying those warm summer days in this sought after location.

The home is minutes away from the Byward Market, The New Edinburgh amenities, Rideau Centre and The University of Ottawa. The area also provides quick access to grocery stores, restaurants, banks, shopping and entertainment.

Welcome to 1276 Dorchester, part of our Arbor Village multi-complex Ottawa West residential community. Our pet friendly and spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments were recently upgraded to include, ceramic tiling in the bathroom and kitchen, hardwood in the living room and bedroom, new countertops, vanities, fixtures, lighting and appliances.

Distinguishing our location is it's placement near Ottawa's Experimental Farm and popular Carling Ave and Merivale Rd. The farm provides magnificent gardens and trails that are perfect for walking, running or biking. Enjoy numerous public parks, shopping, grocery, medical facilities and schools. OTTAWA WEST APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Britannia Beach neighbourhood, Britannia Parkside offers newly updated bachelor apartments, one bedroom apartments, two bedroom apartments and three bedroom apartments. Our residents can enjoy scenic views of the Ottawa River and Gatineau Hills from their doorsteps, walk over to Britannia Beach for a relaxing day under the sun, or take a stroll on the extensive biking and hiking trails just steps away.

HINTONBURG OTTAWA APARTMENTS

address: , Perth K7H 3C5 ON, Canada
description:
1BR Apt For Rent is available Oct 1st, 2020.


Location: 11km to beautiful downtown Perth Ontario.


The custom built timber frame 2-story 1 bedroom apt. is fully furnished and houses additional amenities such as kitchen cookware/tableware/large&small appliances, bedroom King Bed with linens, walk-in closet with 3 drawer cabinet/other. Other fun stuff like a coffee table trunk filled with table games...Basically you only need your computer, cell phone, clothes and food. See photos for included furniture/amenities.


The Rental has a fireplace in the living room, a full kitchen, separate laundry room, large bedroom loft with separate 4 piece ensuite (spa-tub, separate shower stall, sink & thrown) and walk-in closet. Air Conditioning-YES.


INCLUSIVE Amenities: All inclusive utilities (Water, Heat, Hydro, AC, WIFI Internet & Satellite TV). Barn storage-space for summer/winter sports gear. 2 parking spaces. 100 acres to roam with some trails.


Other Amenities: Shared BBQ area with seating, fire-pit with seating, gardens, and gardening area for your own veggie garden if interested. Owner lives on property and takes care of summer property grounds, and winter snow removal.


Tay River public swimming area within 2kms. Tay Valley River canoe/kayak access within 2kms. Mapleview Golf & Country Club (18 hole, Pro Shop and Clubhouse) 5.1kms.


Towns/Cities kms from property: Perth 11km, Westport 23km, Smiths Falls 30km, Carleton Place 46km, Kanata Ottawa 76km and Kingston Ontario 79km.


Rent with included utilities and amenities is $2,300 a month.

There is a 1 year lease (Ontario Rental Contract) to be signed prior to move-in along with first month's rent and an additional $500 deposit. Proof of income to support rent and references mandatory.

If you prefer to Chat or Text 613-276-7438

address: 162 Cambridge St N, Ottawa, ON K1R 7A9, Canada
description: Quiet 24 unit pet-free & smoke-free apartment building in the heart of Chinatown completed in September 2019. This apartment building is conveniently located near the intersection of Bronson Avenue and Somerset St West. A short walk brings you to Chinatown, Little Italy, countless shops and restaurants, and a short commute brings you Carleton University and the downtown core. Each unit comes equipped with a stove, fridge, and dishwasher, and is heated with programmable hydronic floor heating. Heat is included in the rent. This apartment is ideal for people with environmental sensitivities as it is pet-free and smoke-free. This building has an elevator, that provides residents with access to a spacious rooftop terrace.

address: 512 Jackdaw Ave, Ottawa, ON K2J 6M8, Canada
description:
Newly built End-unit 3 Bedroom with Loft Townhome for August 01 Occupancy in a growing community in Barrhaven. 10 minutes’ drive to HWY-416/Costco/Barrhaven-Center, within 30 minutes’ drive to Airport, Downtown and Kanata Technology park.


Be the First to live in this high-quality Tamarack built townhome

Spacious End-Unit with 2165 Sq. ft of living space

No back neighbor, excellent view to Nature behind the back yard

Finished Basement of 455 Sq. ft

3 Bedrooms with Loft

2.5 Bathrooms

Hardwood flooring on the main floor. Carpet in the rest of the living areas.

Ceramic flooring on the entrance, Kitchen and bathrooms

Granite countertops in kitchen and large island

Living room with gas fireplace

Dedicated laundry room on 2nd floor

Central Air Conditioning and Heating

Central Vacuum Cleaner

Stainless Steel Energy Star Five appliances (fridge, stove, dishwasher, washer and dryer)

Oversized garage

Energy Star Certified


House amenities:

Newly built 2-storey semi-detached, Energy Star Certified home by Tamarack. The home is equipped with energy efficient stainless-steel appliances (fridge, stove, dishwasher, washer and dryer), central heating/cooling, central vacuum and a spacious garage with garage-door opener. Large glass windows and doors facing North and South provide ample sunlight throughout the day and provide a pleasant living environment, even in the winter.


Open concept of floor planning that has optimized the living space. A spacious entrance with ceramic tiled floor, coats-closet and powder room leads to the main floor, a finished basement, second floor and entrance to the garage.


Highlights of the Main Floor:

A modern kitchen with ample granite counter-top area, a walk-in-pantry and a large granite topped island with breakfast bar. Amenities in the kitchen includes energy efficient electric oven with cook tops, dish washer and a stainless-steel sink.

Spacious dining space.

Spacious living area with a fireplace with south facing glass doors and large windows that offers sunlight and excellent view to Nature behind the back yard with a common fence. This would be a perfect place for entertaining family and friends.


Highlights of the Second Floor:


Spacious master suite offers separate sitting area, large walk-in closet and luxurious 4-piece ensuite bathroom. Large windows that facing North provide afternoon sunlight and view to open areas.

A cozy loft that offers additional family space.

Comfortably laid-out 2nd and 3rd bedrooms with big closets, with large windows facing south which offer morning sunlight and uninterrupted view of Nature.

A full bathroom and linen closet.

Conveniently placed laundry area with energy efficient washer, drier and storage cabinets.


Highlights of the Basement area:


A finished area with carpets and large window offers additional living spare.

Separate areas for utilities, and storage


For the 3D tour of Tamarack Hudson model home, please visit https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=azRhDhti4DT&sm=2&sr=-.57,.4,.25&sp=7.47,11.97,13.54


For the photos, please visit https://www.tamarackhomes.com/themeadows/townhomes/hudson3bedroom2andahalfbathroomnewtownhomeinottawa.php#pagecontent


Area amenities:

Set in a quiet and friendly neighborhood in the Barrhaven’s Half Moon Bay community, this house is within a few minutes to schools, Minto recreation/sports center, playgrounds, tennis courts, and golf courses. The house is within the Half Moon Bay area also provides an excellent neighbourhood for families with miles of nature trails / bike paths along the Jock river.


Transportation:

Walking distance to OC Transpo Express bus 275 directly to Ottawa downtown, University of Ottawa and Algonquin College.

10 minutes to HWY 416 and within 30 minutes’ drive to Airport, Downtown, Kanata’s Technology Park.

10 minutes to Costco, Barrhaven Center marketplace.

15 minutes to Queensway Carleton Hospital.


Rental conditions:

Rent: $2250/month with minimum one-year lease. Tenant pays utilities (gas, hydro, water and hot water tank rental, cable/internet).

Required documents: Two proofs of ID, Credit check, proof of income documents (i.e. employment letter, 3 payslips or bank statements).

First & last month’s rent required upon credit application approval. 

Absolutely no smoking, no marijuana/cannabis, and no pets.

Home is available for move-in August 1st.

Welcome to one of Ottawa's trendiest districts! Rosebery Apartments is located in the heart of the Glebe, attracting young professionals who desire the comforts of home (without the burden of upkeep and maintenance), but need the accessibility to Ottawa's downtown core. Done in a trendy retro brick-storefront design, Rosebery Apartments is quickly becoming a desired address for Ottawa's up-and-coming.

This four storey walk-up building offers spacious one and two bedroom apartments with renovated cherry cabinet kitchens, large bright windows, and hardwood flooring throughout. Rosebery Apartments is a place you'll be proud to call home!

Rosebery Apartments are conveniently located in the heart of the Glebe just off of Bank Street. These Ottawa rental apartments are only 10 minutes from Parliament Hill and Rideau Center and are close to all amenities including Carleton University, Lansdowne Park, and many more popular restaurants, shops and parks. address: 926 Rue Principale, Saint-Paul-d'Abbotsford, QC J0E 1A0, Canada
description:
The cottage for rent is a Swiss Chalet style of country house made of wood and stone located at the foot of Mount Yamaska on a parcel of land that includes a natural reserve.


This naturally bright country house with its porches and windows on all four sides offers a spectacular view of the property and its natural beauty. With the house being about three hundred feet from the highway, this property is very private around the house and pool areas, especially from May to October, when distant neighbours cannot be seen or heard.


The property is located in the municipality of Saint-Paul-d'Abbostford in the heart of Québec's Montérégie region. The villégiature atmosphere and fertile soils of the St-Paul area have attracted cultivators and artisans alike. The area is known for producing quality apples, maple syrup and wine.


Ideally located this beautiful property is:


- About 10 kilometers from Granby and its big stores

- About 40 minutes from the Champlain Bridge in Montreal

- About 13 minutes from exit 55 on Autoroute 10

- Half way between Montréal and Sherbrooke

- About 30 minutes from Bromont ski hill.

- About 50 minutes from Sutton ski hill

- About 50 minutes from villégiature towns of Knowlton and Sutton

- About 7 minutes from the village of St-Paul-d'Abbotsford

- About 1 hour from U.S. border (Vermont and New York)


A big portion of the property has been declared a natural reserve. Dan and I are proud owners of this property and we will not only be the owners of the natural reserve but also its keepers and protectors.


This property is ideal for people who love nature or want a country house for the weekends.


Come and discover this little piece of paradise at the foot of Mont Yamaska.


Available weekends and weekly all year.


Sleeps 6 adults and 3 children


Perfect as a base for tourist and events such as:


- Granby Zoo

- Soccer/ hockey tournaments

- Bromont skiing/water slides

- Wineries

- Apples

- Ski Sutton

- business meetings / retreats


For more information on the property, visit our website:

http://swiffy-j.com/gamine/

address: 108 Lisgar St, Ottawa, ON K2P 0C2, Canada
description:
Spectacular and peaceful one-bedroom apartment in Ottawa’s most luxurious building - the new (2014) Art Deco high rise “the Merit” (by Charlesfort Developments). The building is directly across the street from Ottawa City Hall, one block from Elgin Street.


The apartment is 810 sqft and add to that a stunning 256 sqft south-facing private terrace off of the living room that is for your own use only (shown in photo 1). Ceiling height in the apartment is 11 feet.


The suite includes a refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, microwave, and a full-size washing machine and clothes dryer. It also includes a pantry.


A parking spot in the first level of the heated underground garage is included.


The top floor terrace of the building is a common element of the building. It has a fantastic view of downtown Ottawa. The terrace includes tables and chairs and there are also barbecues. Another common element is the workout room on the main floor.


The rent of $2,500 per month includes heat and water but does not include hydro or internet.


Available September 1 for a minimum one-year lease (month to month with two months’ notice of departure after that).


Non-smokers only. Pets will be considered.


References will be checked and a credit check will be conducted.


24 hours notice for viewings, please, to accommodate my tenant and to ensure health protocols are in place.

address: 375 Lisgar St, Ottawa, ON K2P 0E3, Canada
description:
This luxurious 1226 square foot corner unit with 2 bedrooms and two full baths has hardwood flooring, large windows, a gas fireplace and a large balcony for summer enjoyment and the BBQ. North facing windows get plenty of natural light. Open concept main rooms and a private master suite with a walk through closet area and 3pc bathroom. The open concept kitchen has stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, tiled backsplash, lots of cupboard /counter space and a kitchen island with a cafe eating area. The main space is versatile and provides great enjoyment areas that have good natural light.


The Everett is located in the sought after urban neighbourhood of Centre town just west of Bank St. Low rise building built by Domicile. Known for being an excellent place to live and has been well managed.


You’ll be within walking distance to all that Urban Living has to offer. Transitway, LRT station, great bike lanes shopping and the best restaurants are all so close you can walk to them or order pick up. Farm boy, corner store, drug store all within 2 blocks. Large balcony with gas hook up for BBqing.

Welcome to 1030-1040 Hollington, offering modern home comforts in a ideal Ottawa West neighbourhood. This building offers spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments, which include hardwood and ceramic flooring, along with new vanities and fixtures. These suites have been sought after by young professionals, couples, small families, students and retirees who are all looking for the convenience of city life with the comforts of home.

Arbor Village is located along the edges of Ottawa's scenic Experimental Farm. Residents at Hollington can enjoy the farm's exceptional gardens, as well as the walking and biking trails. It's convenient location to Ottawa's popular Carling Ave and Merivale Rd is ideal due to the numerous public parks, shopping options, restaurants, grocery stores, medical facilities and schools. Nearby public transportation and Highway 417 make commuting to work or school easy.

A beautiful walk or short drive can take you to the Rideau Canal, where you will find scenic views and trails, as well as a selection of restaurants. Students are attracted to the village's close proximity to the acclaimed Carleton University and Algonquin College.

The area is minutes away from Costco, Tanger Outlets, The Canadian Tire Centre and Kanata Centrum; providing access to grocery stores, restaurants, cinemas, shopping and all necessary amenities.

description:
Available on September 1st, professionally painted and furnished Penthouse condo for rent in modern downtown condo building in the heart of Ottawa. It includes a heated and spacious underground parking spot, central air conditioning/heating with smart Nest thermostat, in-unit laundry, dishwasher, and a convenient storage unit. Utilities (hydro and water) included.

Unpack your suitcases and enjoy the privacy of an executive condo in Ottawa's business/political district, across the street from a pharmacy, a supermarket, a dry-cleaner and a gym/salt-water pool.

Luxurious corner unit with floor-to-ceiling windows, which provide 270-degree views over Ottawa's Southeast, South and Southwest; over 30-kilometre vistas, including the Ottawa River. Sunrises in the morning, and sunsets at dusk. Unique and inspired living for teleworking arrangements.

Only five neighbours per floor, in a quiet and well-managed building. High-speed elevator with short waiting times.

Ideal for professionals seeking the convenience of being close to all services, while avoiding a rental apartment building. Walking distance to Parliament, several Ministries, Bank of Canada, embassies, and consulates.

Large open space with separate bedroom (king-sized bed), and a premium mattress. Custom privacy/blackout window screen in bedroom and custom privacy blinds in the living and dining spaces. Designated computer desk in the den. Ample dressing area with additional closet space. German leather sofa in the living space. High-end mid-century designer furniture. Sunny penthouse balcony open to the sky. Premium hardwood floors throughout, ideal for individuals with allergies.

Granite countertops and backsplash, quiet appliances (including Fisher-Paykel refrigerator from New Zealand), in-unit washer and dryer (including a brand new Samsung steam washer), and Nespresso coffee machine.

Also included, a heated, convenient and spacious parking spot on the first underground floor (with remote door opener), and a storage unit conveniently located next to the parking spot.

Proof of indeterminate employment and references required.

Sorry, pets and smoking not allowed.

Perfect condo for professionals seeking to be close to all that Ottawa has to offer.

address: Harmattan Ave, Stittsville, ON K2S 0G3, Canada
description:
This is a ~1900 square foot home, newly built and completed in June of 2020 in

the new mattamy development of "Fairwinds". There are 4 bedrooms, and 3.5

bathrooms.


The ground floor has been converted into a guest bedroom plus an

ensuite washroom. On this level you will find the laundry facilities.


The main (2nd) level of the townhome has a living room with hardwood floors, a

powder room/bath, and a kitchen/dining room with access to a large patio

situated on top of the garage.


The third level contains the master bedroom and two other smaller bedrooms.

There is a shared bathroom between the two smaller bedrooms. The master

bedroom has an ensuite bathroom with ceramic tile flooring as well as a

walk-in closet.


The basement is unfinished, and as to the exterior of the house, there should

be minimal yard maintenance as the townhome has a small yard in the front and

NO yard in the back (instead allocating the space to the garage and patio).


There is an inline water heater, and high ceilings throughout lend a spacious

feeling.


In terms of Amenities, you will be close to a lot of shopping. Tanger Outlet

mall, Kanata Centrum, and new shopping developments along Hazeldean Road are

all within a very short drive, or possibly a walk (to hazeldean). Costco is

also situated nearby. There are walking trails nearby along poole creek.


The property has great access to the Queensway / 417 via the palladium drive

on/off ramp, however it is not so close that traffic noise is particularly

noticeable. In terms of public transit, the #62 and #162 bus service the

neighbourhood, and the #61 is also within walking distance. The "Rush Hour"

service also includes the #261 and #263.


For perspective tenants with children, there are nearby neighborhood parks,

some of which have water 'features' for children during the summer.


No pets is preferred. That being said it's not a 'hard no' if you have a pet,

but please let us know what type of pet or pets you have.

address: 233 Wesley Ave, Ottawa, ON K1Z 7A2, Canada
description:
LOCATION! WESTBORO! LOCATION!


HOUSE FOR RENT STARTING Dec 2020 - Right in the heart of Westboro, Ottawa’s most sought out neighbourhood!


Designed by Rosalind J. Hill and newly constructed in 2017, this 3300 sq ft, 4-bedroom, 3.5 bath, luxury semi-detached is ideal for the busy family, executive or diplomat.


The open concept design is bright, spacious and inviting made possible with floor-to-ceiling windows and 9 ft ceilings. The main living area has a modern rustic feel which includes the living room with gas fireplace, dining area and gourmet kitchen complete with quartz countertops, custom cabinetry, pantry and stainless-steel appliances. A large separate entrance ensures complete privacy and a separate mud room to the garage keeps things neat and tidy.


The second floor includes 4 large bedrooms, with ample storage. The master includes a walk-in closet and a separate ensuite that includes a free-standing soaker tub and separate shower. The laundry room is conveniently located on the second floor. Tile and hardwood flooring throughout the main and second floor.


A fully finished basement with 9 ft ceilings offers more entertaining space, an area for that special hobby or a rec room for the children.


Leave your car behind and enjoy all that Westboro has to offer! Walk 3 minutes to Richmond Road where you’ll find numerous coffee shops, restaurants, banks, grocery and specialty stores. Walk another few minutes and hop on light rail. Nearby are a variety of school options for the children.


Beautifully manicured and professionally maintained lawn and gardens, front and back, make outdoor living breezy and light. Enjoy a BBQ on the deck as the warm westerly sun touches your skin. During the winter months, park your vehicle in the oversized garage and enjoy complementary snow removal day and night.


$4,000 per month. Water and snow removal included.


Available December 2020 – minimum 1 year lease

Pets will be considered.

description:
We offer our full-fledged two-bedroom guest suite with a separate entrance, a private typical 3/4 bathroom, kitchenette, and parking space!


Ideal for a professional couple or student friends!


Do you want to live in a quiet and safe residential neighbourhood away from the excessive noise and roaring city traffic while yet in close proximity to downtown Ottawa? How about to enjoy the peace of mind associated with the mental freedom of renting in one of the best Ottawa neighbourhoods for families convenient for those who work in downtown or study at uOttawa or Collège La Cité etc.?


If your answer is "Yes," you may continue to read.


It is located in a nice family neighborhood close to retail, transit and parks. Short walk to Convent Glen Shopping Centre whether for your everyday grocery essentials or other errands. There are numerous amenities in the neighbourhood including Metro, Dollarama, Shoppers Drug Mart, RBC and TD banks. It’s also a short bus ride to Place d'Orléans and many more.


It comes with a separate kitchenette and private 3-pc bathroom with modern shower (currently under renovation for your fresh start soon).


Kitchenette comes with a sink, induction hot plate, top freezer refrigerator, microwave oven and countertop convection oven.


One bedroom occupies the main floor, while the other occupies the basement with access to living room. Both rooms receive a lot of sunlight from wide windows. 1600$ monthly for whole place or 900 for one of the two bedrooms.


Located near the junction of Jeanne d'Arc Blvd / Orléans Boulevard, this place is minutes east from the centre of Ottawa, the location is easily accessible by bus/LRT or car from any direction of the city.


By Train (LRT) and Bus

Several direct bus routes will conveniently connect you to OC Transpo’s new Light Rail System at Blair LRT station (including #34, 38, 138).


By car:

Quick access to the heart of the nation’s capital via the Queensway Highway 174.


Other information:

-Proof of Income will be required

-Reference Checks and Credit Reports will be sought

address: 199 Slater St., Ottawa, ON K1P 0A6, Canada
description:
TEMPORARILY UNAVAILABLE
Beautiful 1+Den bedroom suite in a new luxury condo – perfect for anyone looking to work from home in the heart of Ottawa’s central business district.

LOCATION: Within a block or two is access to two LRT stations, coffee shops, restaurants, grocery stores, and bars. A short 12 minute walk to the University of Ottawa, the Byward Market, Rideau Centre, City Hall, Parliament Hill, and the NAC. The prime location of this condo cannot be understated; it is located perfectly for work and entertainment.

TRANSPORTATION: With such a fantastic location, there is not much need for transportation, but if required, the LRT is only a block away. Additionally, 1 car parking spot is also included, as is a secured bicycle rack area!

CONDO: Includes a gym, outdoor hot tub, party room, theatre room, billiards room, banquet room, and lounge. Hallways are carpeted and there are two big elevators. 1 storage locker is included with this unit! The building is combined with the Alt Hotel, which has an amazing bar and high-end food take-out conveniently available without stepping outside!

UNIT: Includes an extremely private southward-facing balcony with stunning views of the city from the 9th floor. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances including a fridge/freezer, a microwave, stovetops, an oven, a dishwasher, tons of cupboard space, and a kitchen island! In the unit is also central A/C and an extremely convenient in unit washer and dryer. It is a beautiful, modern unit with open windows from floor to ceiling (including blinds) and hardwood floors throughout the entire unit. Bedroom fits a queen sized bed. Spacious bedroom with gorgeous windows showing the city and a lot of beautiful sunlight. A private den area perfect for entertaining. Two closets: one near the entrance and one in the bedroom. Bathroom has a glass-enclosed shower. Unit is unfurnished. As a corner unit, it is in a very private area. The apartment is perfect for one person or a couple.

UTILITIES: Includes water and heating. Tenant pays for hydro and Internet.

CLEAN: The unit has been thoroughly disinfected to ensure peace of mind during the COVID-19 pandemic. Similarly, the building’s property management disinfects all entryways, facilities, and high-touch surfaces several times daily.

RENT: $2,250/month for a 1 year contract.

REQUIREMENTS: No pets, no smokers. 2 references. First and last month rent deposits upon signing. Credit score from Equifax. Income statement from the last year and current salary. Available immediately.

Please contact Peter at 873-288-2356 or peterssi@yahoo.com for more information.

description:
2-bedroom penthouse apartment in Sandy Hill available as early as June 15th. $2555/month (except June, which is already paid for), UTILITIES INCLUDED. This can be a short-term rental until the end of the lease term on August 31st, or a long-term rental if you choose to renew the lease at the end of the term.


We are looking for someone to take over our lease in a two-bedroom apartment. The apartment is gorgeous and spacious: it is two-storeys and located on the 24th floor (penthouse) overlooking the Rideau River. The building is just steps away from Strathcona Park, a 10 minute walk from the University of Ottawa., and a 30 minute walk (five minute drive) downtown. This space is perfect for students who are looking for a quiet, homey space to study; young professionals who want to upgrade; or a small family looking for space to grow and play.


Hear, Air Conditioning, Water, and Electricity are all included in the rent. There is a functional, wood-burning fireplace in the living room. Pay-per-use laundry is located in the building (card operated). There is a swimming pool and a convenience store in the building (presently closed due to COVID). The building is also pet friendly!


The current lease already includes one outdoor parking spot at $55/month. The building also has underground parking and there is also the possibility of extra storage, depending on availability.


We are looking to assign the lease as soon as possible. If you are able to move in in June, the rent is already covered (two weeks free if you move in June 15th). Please contact me by email, text, or phone call. If I do not answer the phone, please feel free to leave a message.

address: , Ottawa K1L8A7 ON, Canada
description:
This one bedroom 8th floor condo in the heart of Beechwood/New Edinburgh has sprawling views of the Rockliffe neighbourhood, Beechwood cemetery, Gatineau hills, and downtown. You can watch the gorgeous Ottawa valley sunsets from your own large balcony in the summer, and enjoy a birds-eye view of the Fall Rhapsody in the Gatineau Park in the fall. The balcony also has a 4-seat patio set and a gas BBQ.

The kitchen has quartz countertops, a gas stovetop and oven, mini bar area with wine-rack, and many cupboards for storage. There is also a large island with space to entertain your dinner guests. More storage can be found in the washer/dryer area, the front closet, and the generously sized bedroom closet. Floor to ceiling windows along the length of the condo ensure that your space is bright and sunny all day, and the windows are equipped with solid blinds to keep the sunlight out when you need. Enjoy a tranquil, spa-like experience at home with a soaker tub, soft lighting in the shower of the bathroom, and more quartz-countertops in the bathroom.


The condo is within walking distance to the river, Byward Market, Rideau Centre, and a few minutes’ drive to Trainyards, highway 417, Gatineau park, and many more. You can get to any part of Ottawa in less than 20 minutes from home!


The neighbourhood of Beechwood is a favourite for all lifestyles – there are private, public, English, French schools nearby, community centres, public libraries, farmers’ markets, groceries and pharmacies within walking distance, well-known restaurants and cafés, and lovely neighbours!


Rent includes all appliances (in-unit washer and dryer, fridge, microwave/hoodfan combo, and dishwasher), internet, water, gas, furniture, one parking space, and one storage unit. The unit is located in a no smoking building, and no pets please. Rental application requires a credit and reference checks, proof of income; first and last month’s rent required upon signing.


Features:

- 9ft ceilings

- Quartz countertops in kitchen & bathroom

- Large kitchen island with seating space

- Mini-bar area, wine-rack

- Gas hook-up with BBQ included on balcony

- Furniture included

- Parking included

- Storage locker included


Building amenities:

Location:

- A few minutes’ walking distance to grocery stores, pharmacies, cafés, restaurants, community centres, schools

Close to many stores, parks, schools, restaurants, the Gloucester Center shopping mall and the Pineview golf course, this upgraded 3 bedrooms (and 1 office) townhouse with an indoor garage is nested in a charming and peaceful neighborhood. The main level displays gleaming floors in an open concept layout with a gorgeous eat-in kitchen, floor to ceiling windows and a brand new 2-piece bathroom. The 2nd floor features a full 3-piece bathroom and 3 good size bedrooms, including a huge master bedroom with a 2-piece en-suite bathroom. In the basement, you will have access to a private office/bedroom, a family/living room, a double sink with storage shelves and another 3-piece bathroom including a stand-up shower. The backyard patio connects directly to a large green common area with tons of space for children to play outside.

Please email or text Joseph at 613-909-5964 to book your visit. Thank you.

address: 518 Rochester St, Ottawa, ON K1S 4L9, Canada
description:
Condo-style, luxury one-bed apartment for rent in the Dow's Lake area of Ottawa. Enjoy the best views of Little Italy, just minutes away from local Italian delis, supermarkets, the Ottawa Civic Hospital, and all major transit routes including the O-Train. The luxury suite features in-suite laundry and 4 stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and microwave, for your convenience. The premium finishes include quartz slab countertops, built-in breakfast bar and luxury vinyl plank flooring. Shaker style PVC door cabinetry with tile backsplash and hardware. The building includes excellent amenities such as a fitness facility, a social room, and rooftop lounge.

Live right in the heart of Little Italy, close to all the shopping, entertainment, trendy bars and restaurants. From here, getting around is easy, either on foot, on the Trillium or Confederation light rail system or local bus routes. You’re close to Dow's Lake with access to the Rideau Canal, Commissioners Park, home of the Canadian Tulip Festival, and the Central Experimental Farm. Both Cyclists and those on foot will enjoy the many scenic pathways in the neighbourhood. This apartment is a short distance to trendy cafes and shops on Wellington, the uprising neighbourhood of Westboro, and a quick bus ride to the Capital's downtown Byward Market and Rideau Centre. Available short-term as well as long-term.

description: For serious applicants only: amazing opportunity to garner a long term lease with loads of income potential in a superb mixed-use 94 acre rural property. Lower portion of barn has been used for cattle and horses, potential tiny house (work-in-progress), ample parking and equipment shed all available. The land encompasses lawned areas, garden areas, fenced (horse/cattle friendly) pastures, open fields, acres of mixed species woods (i.e., maple trees - we made our own maple syrup this past winter), flowing stream, ponds, and wetlands. The house is serviced by a modern wood burning furnace that supplies heat and hot water, a dedicated well, septic system, and a rural internet capability can be co-opted. A long-term lease is negotiable across all areas and will be competitive against comparable facilities.
